44 struct CompareValueOnly
45 {
46  bool operator()(const pair<int64_t, pair<const CWalletTx*, unsigned int> >& t1,
47  const pair<int64_t, pair<const CWalletTx*, unsigned int> >& t2) const
48  {

53 const CWalletTx* CWallet::GetWalletTx(const uint256& hash) const
54 {
55  LOCK(cs_wallet);
56  std::map<uint256, CWalletTx>::const_iterator it = mapWallet.find(hash);
57  if (it == mapWallet.end())
58  return NULL;
59  return &(it->second);
60 }

62 CPubKey CWallet::GenerateNewKey()
63 {
64  AssertLockHeld(cs_wallet); // mapKeyMetadata
65  bool fCompressed = CanSupportFeature(FEATURE_COMPRPUBKEY); // default to compressed public keys if we want 0.6.0 wallets
66 
67  CKey secret;
68  secret.MakeNewKey(fCompressed);
69 
70  // Compressed public keys were introduced in version 0.6.0
71  if (fCompressed)
72  SetMinVersion(FEATURE_COMPRPUBKEY);
73 
74  CPubKey pubkey = secret.GetPubKey();
75  assert(secret.VerifyPubKey(pubkey));
76 
77  // Create new metadata
78  int64_t nCreationTime = GetTime();
79  mapKeyMetadata[pubkey.GetID()] = CKeyMetadata(nCreationTime);
80  if (!nTimeFirstKey || nCreationTime < nTimeFirstKey)
81  nTimeFirstKey = nCreationTime;
82 
83  if (!AddKeyPubKey(secret, pubkey))
84  throw std::runtime_error("CWallet::GenerateNewKey() : AddKey failed");
85  return pubkey;
86 }
87 
88 bool CWallet::AddKeyPubKey(const CKey& secret, const CPubKey &pubkey)
89 {
90  AssertLockHeld(cs_wallet); // mapKeyMetadata
91  if (!CCryptoKeyStore::AddKeyPubKey(secret, pubkey))
92  return false;
93 
94  // check if we need to remove from watch-only
95  CScript script;
96  script = GetScriptForDestination(pubkey.GetID());
97  if (HaveWatchOnly(script))
98  RemoveWatchOnly(script);
99 
100  if (!fFileBacked)
101  return true;
102  if (!IsCrypted()) {
103  return CWalletDB(strWalletFile).WriteKey(pubkey, secret.GetPrivKey(), mapKeyMetadata[pubkey.GetID()]);
104  }
105  return true;
106 }

108 bool CWallet::AddCryptedKey(const CPubKey &vchPubKey, const vector<unsigned char> &vchCryptedSecret)
109 {
110  if (!CCryptoKeyStore::AddCryptedKey(vchPubKey, vchCryptedSecret))
111  return false;
112  if (!fFileBacked)
113  return true;
114  {
115  LOCK(cs_wallet);
116  if (pwalletdbEncryption)
117  return pwalletdbEncryption->WriteCryptedKey(vchPubKey, vchCryptedSecret, mapKeyMetadata[vchPubKey.GetID()]);
118  else
119  return CWalletDB(strWalletFile).WriteCryptedKey(vchPubKey, vchCryptedSecret, mapKeyMetadata[vchPubKey.GetID()]);
120  }
121  return false;
122 }

124 bool CWallet::LoadKeyMetadata(const CPubKey &pubkey, const CKeyMetadata &meta)
125 {
126  AssertLockHeld(cs_wallet); // mapKeyMetadata
127  if (meta.nCreateTime && (!nTimeFirstKey || meta.nCreateTime < nTimeFirstKey))
128  nTimeFirstKey = meta.nCreateTime;
129 
130  mapKeyMetadata[pubkey.GetID()] = meta;
131  return true;

153 bool CWallet::LoadCScript(const CScript& redeemScript)
154 {
155  /* A sanity check was added in pull #3843 to avoid adding redeemScripts
156  * that never can be redeemed. However, old wallets may still contain
157  * these. Do not add them to the wallet and warn. */
158  if (redeemScript.size() > MAX_SCRIPT_ELEMENT_SIZE)
159  {
160  std::string strAddr = CIonAddress(redeemScript.GetID()).ToString();
161  LogPrintf("%s: Warning: This wallet contains a redeemScript of size %u which exceeds maximum size %i thus can never be redeemed. Do not use address %s.\n",
162  __func__, redeemScript.size(), MAX_SCRIPT_ELEMENT_SIZE, strAddr);
163  return true;
164  }
165 
166  return CCryptoKeyStore::AddCScript(redeemScript);
167 }

169 bool CWallet::AddWatchOnly(const CScript &dest)
170 {
171  if (!CCryptoKeyStore::AddWatchOnly(dest))
172  return false;
173  nTimeFirstKey = 1; // No birthday information for watch-only keys.
174  if (!fFileBacked)
175  return true;
176  return CWalletDB(strWalletFile).WriteWatchOnly(dest);
177 }

179 bool CWallet::RemoveWatchOnly(const CScript &dest)
180 {
181  AssertLockHeld(cs_wallet);
182  if (!CCryptoKeyStore::RemoveWatchOnly(dest))
183  return false;
184  if (!HaveWatchOnly())
185  NotifyWatchonlyChanged(false);
186  if (fFileBacked)
187  if (!CWalletDB(strWalletFile).EraseWatchOnly(dest))
188  return false;
189 
190  return true;
191 }

193 bool CWallet::LoadWatchOnly(const CScript &dest)

195  return CCryptoKeyStore::AddWatchOnly(dest);

198 bool CWallet::Lock()
199 {
200  if (IsLocked())
201  return true;
202 
203  if (fDebug)
204  printf("Locking wallet.\n");
205 
206  {
207  LOCK(cs_wallet);
208  CWalletDB wdb(strWalletFile);
209 
210  // -- load encrypted spend_secret of stealth addresses
211  CStealthAddress sxAddrTemp;
212  std::set<CStealthAddress>::iterator it;
213  for (it = stealthAddresses.begin(); it != stealthAddresses.end(); ++it)
214  {
215  if (it->scan_secret.size() < 32)
216  continue; // stealth address is not owned
217  // -- CStealthAddress are only sorted on spend_pubkey
218  CStealthAddress &sxAddr = const_cast<CStealthAddress&>(*it);
219  if (fDebug)
220  printf("Recrypting stealth key %s\n", sxAddr.Encoded().c_str());
221 
222  sxAddrTemp.scan_pubkey = sxAddr.scan_pubkey;
223  if (!wdb.ReadStealthAddress(sxAddrTemp))
224  {
225  printf("Error: Failed to read stealth key from db %s\n", sxAddr.Encoded().c_str());
226  continue;
227  }
228  sxAddr.spend_secret = sxAddrTemp.spend_secret;
229  };
230  }
231  return LockKeyStore();
232 };
233 
234 bool CWallet::Unlock(const SecureString& strWalletPassphrase, bool anonymizeOnly)
235 {
236  SecureString strWalletPassphraseFinal;
237 
238  if(!IsLocked())
239  {
240  fWalletUnlockAnonymizeOnly = anonymizeOnly;
241  return true;
242  }
243 
244  strWalletPassphraseFinal = strWalletPassphrase;
245 
246  CCrypter crypter;
247  CKeyingMaterial vMasterKey;
248 
249  {
250  LOCK(cs_wallet);
251  BOOST_FOREACH(const MasterKeyMap::value_type& pMasterKey, mapMasterKeys)
252  {
253  if(!crypter.SetKeyFromPassphrase(strWalletPassphraseFinal, pMasterKey.second.vchSalt, pMasterKey.second.nDeriveIterations, pMasterKey.second.nDerivationMethod))
254  return false;
255  if (!crypter.Decrypt(pMasterKey.second.vchCryptedKey, vMasterKey))
256  return false;
257  if (!CCryptoKeyStore::Unlock(vMasterKey))
258  return false;
259  break;
260  }
261 
262  fWalletUnlockAnonymizeOnly = anonymizeOnly;
263  UnlockStealthAddresses(vMasterKey);
264  return true;
265  }
266  return false;
267 }
268 
269 bool CWallet::ChangeWalletPassphrase(const SecureString& strOldWalletPassphrase, const SecureString& strNewWalletPassphrase)
270 {
271  bool fWasLocked = IsLocked();
272 
273  SecureString strOldWalletPassphraseFinal;
274  strOldWalletPassphraseFinal = strOldWalletPassphrase;
275 
276  {
277  LOCK(cs_wallet);
278  Lock();
279 
280  CCrypter crypter;
281  CKeyingMaterial vMasterKey;
282  BOOST_FOREACH(MasterKeyMap::value_type& pMasterKey, mapMasterKeys)
283  {
284  if(!crypter.SetKeyFromPassphrase(strOldWalletPassphraseFinal, pMasterKey.second.vchSalt, pMasterKey.second.nDeriveIterations, pMasterKey.second.nDerivationMethod))
285  return false;
286  if (!crypter.Decrypt(pMasterKey.second.vchCryptedKey, vMasterKey))
287  return false;
288  if (CCryptoKeyStore::Unlock(vMasterKey)
289  && UnlockStealthAddresses(vMasterKey))
290  {
291  int64_t nStartTime = GetTimeMillis();
292  crypter.SetKeyFromPassphrase(strNewWalletPassphrase, pMasterKey.second.vchSalt, pMasterKey.second.nDeriveIterations, pMasterKey.second.nDerivationMethod);
293  pMasterKey.second.nDeriveIterations = pMasterKey.second.nDeriveIterations * (100 / ((double)(GetTimeMillis() - nStartTime)));
294 
295  nStartTime = GetTimeMillis();
296  crypter.SetKeyFromPassphrase(strNewWalletPassphrase, pMasterKey.second.vchSalt, pMasterKey.second.nDeriveIterations, pMasterKey.second.nDerivationMethod);
297  pMasterKey.second.nDeriveIterations = (pMasterKey.second.nDeriveIterations + pMasterKey.second.nDeriveIterations * 100 / ((double)(GetTimeMillis() - nStartTime))) / 2;
298 
299  if (pMasterKey.second.nDeriveIterations < 25000)
300  pMasterKey.second.nDeriveIterations = 25000;
301 
302  LogPrintf("Wallet passphrase changed to an nDeriveIterations of %i\n", pMasterKey.second.nDeriveIterations);
303 
304  if (!crypter.SetKeyFromPassphrase(strNewWalletPassphrase, pMasterKey.second.vchSalt, pMasterKey.second.nDeriveIterations, pMasterKey.second.nDerivationMethod))
305  return false;
306  if (!crypter.Encrypt(vMasterKey, pMasterKey.second.vchCryptedKey))
307  return false;
308  CWalletDB(strWalletFile).WriteMasterKey(pMasterKey.first, pMasterKey.second);
309  if (fWasLocked)
310  Lock();
311  return true;
312  }
313  }
314  }
315 
316  return false;
317 }

325 bool CWallet::SetMinVersion(enum WalletFeature nVersion, CWalletDB* pwalletdbIn, bool fExplicit)
326 {
327  LOCK(cs_wallet); // nWalletVersion
328  if (nWalletVersion >= nVersion)
329  return true;
330 
331  // when doing an explicit upgrade, if we pass the max version permitted, upgrade all the way
332  if (fExplicit && nVersion > nWalletMaxVersion)
333  nVersion = FEATURE_LATEST;
334 
335  nWalletVersion = nVersion;
336 
337  if (nVersion > nWalletMaxVersion)
338  nWalletMaxVersion = nVersion;
339 
340  if (fFileBacked)
341  {
342  CWalletDB* pwalletdb = pwalletdbIn ? pwalletdbIn : new CWalletDB(strWalletFile);
343  if (nWalletVersion > 40000)
344  pwalletdb->WriteMinVersion(nWalletVersion);
345  if (!pwalletdbIn)
346  delete pwalletdb;
347  }
348 
349  return true;
350 }
351 
352 bool CWallet::SetMaxVersion(int nVersion)
353 {
354  LOCK(cs_wallet); // nWalletVersion, nWalletMaxVersion
355  // cannot downgrade below current version
356  if (nWalletVersion > nVersion)
357  return false;
358 
359  nWalletMaxVersion = nVersion;
360 
361  return true;
362 }

364 set<uint256> CWallet::GetConflicts(const uint256& txid) const
365 {
366  set<uint256> result;
367  AssertLockHeld(cs_wallet);
368 
369  std::map<uint256, CWalletTx>::const_iterator it = mapWallet.find(txid);
370  if (it == mapWallet.end())
371  return result;
372  const CWalletTx& wtx = it->second;
373 
374  std::pair<TxSpends::const_iterator, TxSpends::const_iterator> range;
375 
376  BOOST_FOREACH(const CTxIn& txin, wtx.vin)
377  {
378  if (mapTxSpends.count(txin.prevout) <= 1)
379  continue; // No conflict if zero or one spends
380  range = mapTxSpends.equal_range(txin.prevout);
381  for (TxSpends::const_iterator it = range.first; it != range.second; ++it)
382  result.insert(it->second);
383  }
384  return result;
385 }
386 
387 void CWallet::SyncMetaData(pair<TxSpends::iterator, TxSpends::iterator> range)
388 {
389  // We want all the wallet transactions in range to have the same metadata as
390  // the oldest (smallest nOrderPos).
391  // So: find smallest nOrderPos:
392 
393  int nMinOrderPos = std::numeric_limits<int>::max();
394  const CWalletTx* copyFrom = NULL;
395  for (TxSpends::iterator it = range.first; it != range.second; ++it)
396  {
397  const uint256& hash = it->second;
398  int n = mapWallet[hash].nOrderPos;
399  if (n < nMinOrderPos)
400  {
401  nMinOrderPos = n;
402  copyFrom = &mapWallet[hash];
403  }
404  }
405  // Now copy data from copyFrom to rest:
406  for (TxSpends::iterator it = range.first; it != range.second; ++it)
407  {
408  const uint256& hash = it->second;
409  CWalletTx* copyTo = &mapWallet[hash];
410  if (copyFrom == copyTo) continue;
411  copyTo->mapValue = copyFrom->mapValue;
412  copyTo->vOrderForm = copyFrom->vOrderForm;
413  // fTimeReceivedIsTxTime not copied on purpose
414  // nTimeReceived not copied on purpose
415  copyTo->nTimeSmart = copyFrom->nTimeSmart;
416  copyTo->fFromMe = copyFrom->fFromMe;
417  copyTo->strFromAccount = copyFrom->strFromAccount;
418  // nOrderPos not copied on purpose
419  // cached members not copied on purpose
420  }
421 }
422 
423 // Outpoint is spent if any non-conflicted transaction
424 // spends it:
425 bool CWallet::IsSpent(const uint256& hash, unsigned int n) const
426 {
427  const COutPoint outpoint(hash, n);
428  pair<TxSpends::const_iterator, TxSpends::const_iterator> range;
429  range = mapTxSpends.equal_range(outpoint);
430 
431  for (TxSpends::const_iterator it = range.first; it != range.second; ++it)
432  {
433  const uint256& wtxid = it->second;
434  std::map<uint256, CWalletTx>::const_iterator mit = mapWallet.find(wtxid);
435  if (mit != mapWallet.end() && mit->second.GetDepthInMainChain() >= 0)
436  return true; // Spent
437  }
438  return false;
439 }

441 void CWallet::AddToSpends(const COutPoint& outpoint, const uint256& wtxid)
442 {
443  mapTxSpends.insert(make_pair(outpoint, wtxid));
444 
445  pair<TxSpends::iterator, TxSpends::iterator> range;
446  range = mapTxSpends.equal_range(outpoint);
447  SyncMetaData(range);
448 }

451 void CWallet::AddToSpends(const uint256& wtxid)
452 {
453  assert(mapWallet.count(wtxid));
454  CWalletTx& thisTx = mapWallet[wtxid];
455  if (thisTx.IsCoinBase()) // Coinbases don't spend anything!
456  return;
457 
458  BOOST_FOREACH(const CTxIn& txin, thisTx.vin)
459  AddToSpends(txin.prevout, wtxid);
460 }

463 bool CWallet::EncryptWallet(const SecureString& strWalletPassphrase)
464 {
465  if (IsCrypted())
466  return false;
467 
468  CKeyingMaterial vMasterKey;
469  RandAddSeedPerfmon();
470 
471  vMasterKey.resize(WALLET_CRYPTO_KEY_SIZE);
472  if (!GetRandBytes(&vMasterKey[0], WALLET_CRYPTO_KEY_SIZE))
473  return false;
474 
475  CMasterKey kMasterKey(nDerivationMethodIndex);
476 
477  RandAddSeedPerfmon();
478  kMasterKey.vchSalt.resize(WALLET_CRYPTO_SALT_SIZE);
479  if (!GetRandBytes(&kMasterKey.vchSalt[0], WALLET_CRYPTO_SALT_SIZE))
480  return false;
481 
482  CCrypter crypter;
483  int64_t nStartTime = GetTimeMillis();
484  crypter.SetKeyFromPassphrase(strWalletPassphrase, kMasterKey.vchSalt, 25000, kMasterKey.nDerivationMethod);
485  kMasterKey.nDeriveIterations = 2500000 / ((double)(GetTimeMillis() - nStartTime));
486 
487  nStartTime = GetTimeMillis();
488  crypter.SetKeyFromPassphrase(strWalletPassphrase, kMasterKey.vchSalt, kMasterKey.nDeriveIterations, kMasterKey.nDerivationMethod);
489  kMasterKey.nDeriveIterations = (kMasterKey.nDeriveIterations + kMasterKey.nDeriveIterations * 100 / ((double)(GetTimeMillis() - nStartTime))) / 2;
490 
491  if (kMasterKey.nDeriveIterations < 25000)
492  kMasterKey.nDeriveIterations = 25000;
493 
494  LogPrintf("Encrypting Wallet with an nDeriveIterations of %i\n", kMasterKey.nDeriveIterations);
495 
496  if (!crypter.SetKeyFromPassphrase(strWalletPassphrase, kMasterKey.vchSalt, kMasterKey.nDeriveIterations, kMasterKey.nDerivationMethod))
497  return false;
498  if (!crypter.Encrypt(vMasterKey, kMasterKey.vchCryptedKey))
499  return false;
500 
501  {
502  LOCK(cs_wallet);
503  mapMasterKeys[++nMasterKeyMaxID] = kMasterKey;
504  if (fFileBacked)
505  {
506  pwalletdbEncryption = new CWalletDB(strWalletFile);
507  if (!pwalletdbEncryption->TxnBegin())
508  return false;
509  pwalletdbEncryption->WriteMasterKey(nMasterKeyMaxID, kMasterKey);
510  }
511 
512  if (!EncryptKeys(vMasterKey))
513  {
514  if (fFileBacked)
515  pwalletdbEncryption->TxnAbort();
516  exit(1); //We now probably have half of our keys encrypted in memory, and half not...die and let the user reload their unencrypted wallet.
517  }
518 
519  std::set<CStealthAddress>::iterator it;
520  for (it = stealthAddresses.begin(); it != stealthAddresses.end(); ++it)
521  {
522  if (it->scan_secret.size() < 32)
523  continue; // stealth address is not owned
524  // -- CStealthAddress is only sorted on spend_pubkey
525  CStealthAddress &sxAddr = const_cast<CStealthAddress&>(*it);
526 
527  if (fDebug)
528  printf("Encrypting stealth key %s\n", sxAddr.Encoded().c_str());
529 
530  std::vector<unsigned char> vchCryptedSecret;
531 
532  CSecret vchSecret;
533  vchSecret.resize(32);
534  memcpy(&vchSecret[0], &sxAddr.spend_secret[0], 32);
535 
536  uint256 iv = Hash(sxAddr.spend_pubkey.begin(), sxAddr.spend_pubkey.end());
537  if (!EncryptSecret(vMasterKey, vchSecret, iv, vchCryptedSecret))
538  {
539  printf("Error: Failed encrypting stealth key %s\n", sxAddr.Encoded().c_str());
540  continue;
541  };
542 
543  sxAddr.spend_secret = vchCryptedSecret;
544  pwalletdbEncryption->WriteStealthAddress(sxAddr);
545  };
546 
547  // Encryption was introduced in version 0.4.0
548  SetMinVersion(FEATURE_WALLETCRYPT, pwalletdbEncryption, true);
549 
550  if (fFileBacked)
551  {
552  if (!pwalletdbEncryption->TxnCommit())
553  exit(1); //We now have keys encrypted in memory, but no on disk...die to avoid confusion and let the user reload their unencrypted wallet.
554 
555  delete pwalletdbEncryption;
556  pwalletdbEncryption = NULL;
557  }
558 
559  Lock();
560  Unlock(strWalletPassphrase);
561  NewKeyPool();
562  Lock();
563 
564  // Need to completely rewrite the wallet file; if we don't, bdb might keep
565  // bits of the unencrypted private key in slack space in the database file.
566  CDB::Rewrite(strWalletFile);
567  }
568  NotifyStatusChanged(this);
569 
570  return true;
571 }
572 
573 int64_t CWallet::IncOrderPosNext(CWalletDB *pwalletdb)
574 {
575  AssertLockHeld(cs_wallet); // nOrderPosNext
576  int64_t nRet = nOrderPosNext++;
577  if (pwalletdb) {
578  pwalletdb->WriteOrderPosNext(nOrderPosNext);
579  } else {
580  CWalletDB(strWalletFile).WriteOrderPosNext(nOrderPosNext);
581  }
582  return nRet;
583 }

585 void CWallet::MarkDirty()

588  LOCK(cs_wallet);

590  item.second.MarkDirty();

593 
594 bool CWallet::AddToWallet(const CWalletTx& wtxIn, bool fFromLoadWallet)
595 {
596  uint256 hash = wtxIn.GetHash();
597  if (fFromLoadWallet)
598  {
599  mapWallet[hash] = wtxIn;
600  CWalletTx& wtx = mapWallet[hash];
601  wtx.BindWallet(this);
602  wtxOrdered.insert(make_pair(wtx.nOrderPos, TxPair(&wtx, (CAccountingEntry*)0)));
603  AddToSpends(hash);
604  }
605  else
606  {
607  LOCK(cs_wallet);
608  // Inserts only if not already there, returns tx inserted or tx found
609  pair<map<uint256, CWalletTx>::iterator, bool> ret = mapWallet.insert(make_pair(hash, wtxIn));
610  CWalletTx& wtx = (*ret.first).second;
611  wtx.BindWallet(this);
612  bool fInsertedNew = ret.second;
613  if (fInsertedNew)
614  {
615  wtx.nTimeReceived = GetAdjustedTime();
616  wtx.nOrderPos = IncOrderPosNext();
617  wtxOrdered.insert(make_pair(wtx.nOrderPos, TxPair(&wtx, (CAccountingEntry*)0)));
618 
619  wtx.nTimeSmart = wtx.nTimeReceived;
620  if (wtxIn.hashBlock != 0)
621  {
622  if (mapBlockIndex.count(wtxIn.hashBlock))
623  {
624  unsigned int latestNow = wtx.nTimeReceived;
625  unsigned int latestEntry = 0;
626  {
627  // Tolerate times up to the last timestamp in the wallet not more than 5 minutes into the future
628  int64_t latestTolerated = latestNow + 300;
629  const TxItems & txOrdered = wtxOrdered;
630  for (TxItems::const_reverse_iterator it = txOrdered.rbegin(); it != txOrdered.rend(); ++it)
631  {
632  CWalletTx *const pwtx = (*it).second.first;
633  if (pwtx == &wtx)
634  continue;
635  CAccountingEntry *const pacentry = (*it).second.second;
636  int64_t nSmartTime;
637  if (pwtx)
638  {
639  nSmartTime = pwtx->nTimeSmart;
640  if (!nSmartTime)
641  nSmartTime = pwtx->nTimeReceived;
642  }
643  else
644  nSmartTime = pacentry->nTime;
645  if (nSmartTime <= latestTolerated)
646  {
647  latestEntry = nSmartTime;
648  if (nSmartTime > latestNow)
649  latestNow = nSmartTime;
650  break;
651  }
652  }
653  }
654 
655  unsigned int& blocktime = mapBlockIndex[wtxIn.hashBlock]->nTime;
656  wtx.nTimeSmart = std::max(latestEntry, std::min(blocktime, latestNow));
657  }
658  else
659  LogPrintf("AddToWallet() : found %s in block %s not in index\n",
660  wtxIn.GetHash().ToString(),
661  wtxIn.hashBlock.ToString());
662  }
663  }
664 
665  bool fUpdated = false;
666  if (!fInsertedNew)
667  {
668  // Merge
669  if (wtxIn.hashBlock != 0 && wtxIn.hashBlock != wtx.hashBlock)
670  {
671  wtx.hashBlock = wtxIn.hashBlock;
672  fUpdated = true;
673  }
674  if (wtxIn.nIndex != -1 && (wtxIn.vMerkleBranch != wtx.vMerkleBranch || wtxIn.nIndex != wtx.nIndex))
675  {
676  wtx.vMerkleBranch = wtxIn.vMerkleBranch;
677  wtx.nIndex = wtxIn.nIndex;
678  fUpdated = true;
679  }
680  if (wtxIn.fFromMe && wtxIn.fFromMe != wtx.fFromMe)
681  {
682  wtx.fFromMe = wtxIn.fFromMe;
683  fUpdated = true;
684  }
685  fUpdated |= wtx.UpdateSpent(wtxIn.vfSpent);
686  }
687 
689  LogPrintf("AddToWallet %s %s%s\n", wtxIn.GetHash().ToString(), (fInsertedNew ? "new" : ""), (fUpdated ? "update" : ""));
690 
691  // Write to disk
692  if (fInsertedNew || fUpdated)
693  if (!wtx.WriteToDisk())
694  return false;
695 
696  // Break debit/credit balance caches:
697  wtx.MarkDirty();
698 
699  // Notify UI of new or updated transaction
700  NotifyTransactionChanged(this, hash, fInsertedNew ? CT_NEW : CT_UPDATED);
701 
702  // notify an external script when a wallet transaction comes in or is updated
703  std::string strCmd = GetArg("-walletnotify", "");
704 
705  if ( !strCmd.empty())
706  {
707  boost::replace_all(strCmd, "%s", wtxIn.GetHash().GetHex());
708  boost::thread t(runCommand, strCmd); // thread runs free
709  }
710 
711  }
712  return true;
713 }
714 
715 // Add a transaction to the wallet, or update it.
716 // pblock is optional, but should be provided if the transaction is known to be in a block.
717 // If fUpdate is true, existing transactions will be updated.
718 bool CWallet::AddToWalletIfInvolvingMe(const CTransaction& tx, const CBlock* pblock, bool fUpdate)
719 {
720  uint256 hash = tx.GetHash();
721  {
722  LOCK(cs_wallet);
723  bool fExisted = mapWallet.count(hash);
724  if (fExisted && !fUpdate) return false;
725 
726  mapValue_t mapNarr;
727  FindStealthTransactions(tx, mapNarr);
728 
729  if (fExisted || IsMine(tx) || IsFromMe(tx))
730  {
731  CWalletTx wtx(this,tx);
732 
733  if (!mapNarr.empty())
734  wtx.mapValue.insert(mapNarr.begin(), mapNarr.end());
735 
736  // Get merkle branch if transaction was found in a block
737  if (pblock)
738  wtx.SetMerkleBranch(pblock);
739 
740  return AddToWallet(wtx);
741  }
742  }
743  return false;
744 }
745 
746 void CWallet::SyncTransaction(const CTransaction& tx, const CBlock* pblock, bool fConnect)
747 {
748  LOCK2(cs_main, cs_wallet);
749  if (!AddToWalletIfInvolvingMe(tx, pblock, true))
750  return; // Not one of ours
751 
752  // If a transaction changes 'conflicted' state, that changes the balance
753  // available of the outputs it spends. So force those to be
754  // recomputed, also:
755  BOOST_FOREACH(const CTxIn& txin, tx.vin)
756  {
757  if (mapWallet.count(txin.prevout.hash))
758  mapWallet[txin.prevout.hash].MarkDirty();
759  }
760 
761  if (!fConnect)
762  {
763  // wallets need to refund inputs when disconnecting coinstake
764  if (tx.IsCoinStake())
765  {
766  if (IsFromMe(tx))
767  DisableTransaction(tx);
768  }
769  return;
770  }
771 
772  AddToWalletIfInvolvingMe(tx, pblock, true);
773 }

775 void CWallet::EraseFromWallet(const uint256 &hash)
776 {
777  if (!fFileBacked)
778  return;
779  {
780  LOCK(cs_wallet);
781  if (mapWallet.erase(hash))
782  CWalletDB(strWalletFile).EraseTx(hash);
783  }
784  return;
785 }

787 isminetype CWallet::IsMine(const CTxIn &txin) const
788 {
789  {
790  LOCK(cs_wallet);
791  map<uint256, CWalletTx>::const_iterator mi = mapWallet.find(txin.prevout.hash);
792  if (mi != mapWallet.end())
793  {
794  const CWalletTx& prev = (*mi).second;
795  if (txin.prevout.n < prev.vout.size())
796  return IsMine(prev.vout[txin.prevout.n]);
797  }
798  }
799  return ISMINE_NO;
800 }

802 CAmount CWallet::GetDebit(const CTxIn &txin, const isminefilter& filter) const
803 {
804  {
805  LOCK(cs_wallet);
806  map<uint256, CWalletTx>::const_iterator mi = mapWallet.find(txin.prevout.hash);
807  if (mi != mapWallet.end())
808  {
809  const CWalletTx& prev = (*mi).second;
810  if (txin.prevout.n < prev.vout.size())
811  if (IsMine(prev.vout[txin.prevout.n]) & filter)
812  return prev.vout[txin.prevout.n].nValue;
813  }
814  }
815  return 0;
816 }
817 
818 // Recursively determine the rounds of a given input (How deep is the Stashedsend chain for a given input)
819 int CWallet::GetRealInputStashedsendRounds(CTxIn in, int rounds) const
820 {
821  static std::map<uint256, CTransaction> mDenomWtxes;
822 
823  if(rounds >= 16) return 15; // 16 rounds max
824 
825  uint256 hash = in.prevout.hash;
826  unsigned int nout = in.prevout.n;
827 
828  const CWalletTx* wtx = GetWalletTx(hash);
829  if(wtx != NULL)
830  {
831  std::map<uint256, CTransaction>::const_iterator mdwi = mDenomWtxes.find(hash);
832  // not known yet, let's add it
833  if(mdwi == mDenomWtxes.end())
834  {
835  LogPrint("stashedsend", "GetInputStashedsendRounds INSERTING %s\n", hash.ToString());
836  mDenomWtxes[hash] = CTransaction(*wtx);
837  }
838  // found and it's not an initial value, just return it
839  else if(mDenomWtxes[hash].vout[nout].nRounds != -10)
840  {
841  return mDenomWtxes[hash].vout[nout].nRounds;
842  }
843 
844 
845  // bounds check
846  if(nout >= wtx->vout.size())
847  {
848  // should never actually hit this
849  LogPrint("stashedsend", "GetInputStashedsendRounds UPDATED %s %3d %3d\n", hash.ToString(), nout, -4);
850  return -4;
851  }
852 
853  if(pwalletMain->IsCollateralAmount(wtx->vout[nout].nValue))
854  {
855  mDenomWtxes[hash].vout[nout].nRounds = -3;
856  LogPrint("stashedsend", "GetInputStashedsendRounds UPDATED %s %3d %3d\n", hash.ToString(), nout, mDenomWtxes[hash].vout[nout].nRounds);
857  return mDenomWtxes[hash].vout[nout].nRounds;
858  }
859 
860  //make sure the final output is non-denominate
861  if(/*rounds == 0 && */!IsDenominatedAmount(wtx->vout[nout].nValue)) //NOT DENOM
862  {
863  mDenomWtxes[hash].vout[nout].nRounds = -2;
864  LogPrint("stashedsend", "GetInputStashedsendRounds UPDATED %s %3d %3d\n", hash.ToString(), nout, mDenomWtxes[hash].vout[nout].nRounds);
865  return mDenomWtxes[hash].vout[nout].nRounds;
866  }
867 
868  bool fAllDenoms = true;
869  BOOST_FOREACH(CTxOut out, wtx->vout)
870  {
871  fAllDenoms = fAllDenoms && IsDenominatedAmount(out.nValue);
872  }
873  // this one is denominated but there is another non-denominated output found in the same tx
874  if(!fAllDenoms)
875  {
876  mDenomWtxes[hash].vout[nout].nRounds = 0;
877  LogPrint("stashedsend", "GetInputStashedsendRounds UPDATED %s %3d %3d\n", hash.ToString(), nout, mDenomWtxes[hash].vout[nout].nRounds);
878  return mDenomWtxes[hash].vout[nout].nRounds;
879  }
880 
881  int nShortest = -10; // an initial value, should be no way to get this by calculations
882  bool fDenomFound = false;
883  // only denoms here so let's look up
884  BOOST_FOREACH(CTxIn in2, wtx->vin)
885  {
886  if(IsMine(in2))
887  {
888  int n = GetRealInputStashedsendRounds(in2, rounds+1);
889  // denom found, find the shortest chain or initially assign nShortest with the first found value
890  if(n >= 0 && (n < nShortest || nShortest == -10))
891  {
892  nShortest = n;
893  fDenomFound = true;
894  }
895  }
896  }
897  mDenomWtxes[hash].vout[nout].nRounds = fDenomFound
898  ? (nShortest >= 15 ? 16 : nShortest + 1) // good, we a +1 to the shortest one but only 16 rounds max allowed
899  : 0; // too bad, we are the fist one in that chain
900  LogPrint("stashedsend", "GetInputStashedsendRounds UPDATED %s %3d %3d\n", hash.ToString(), nout, mDenomWtxes[hash].vout[nout].nRounds);
901  return mDenomWtxes[hash].vout[nout].nRounds;
902  }
903 
904  return rounds-1;
905 }
906 
907 // respect current settings
908 int CWallet::GetInputStashedsendRounds(CTxIn in) const {
909  LOCK(cs_wallet);
910  int realStashedsendRounds = GetRealInputStashedsendRounds(in, 0);
911  return realStashedsendRounds > nStashedsendRounds ? nStashedsendRounds : realStashedsendRounds;
912 }

914 bool CWallet::IsDenominated(const CTxIn &txin) const
915 {

919  if (mi != mapWallet.end())
920  {
921  const CWalletTx& prev = (*mi).second;
922  if (txin.prevout.n < prev.vout.size()) return IsDenominatedAmount(prev.vout[txin.prevout.n].nValue);
923  }
924  }
925  return false;

932  return true;

937 bool CWallet::IsChange(const CTxOut& txout) const
938 {
939  // TODO: fix handling of 'change' outputs. The assumption is that any
940  // payment to a script that is ours, but is not in the address book
941  // is change. That assumption is likely to break when we implement multisignature
942  // wallets that return change back into a multi-signature-protected address;
943  // a better way of identifying which outputs are 'the send' and which are
944  // 'the change' will need to be implemented (maybe extend CWalletTx to remember
945  // which output, if any, was change).
946  if (::IsMine(*this, txout.scriptPubKey))
947  {
948  CTxDestination address;
949  if (!ExtractDestination(txout.scriptPubKey, address))
950  return true;
951 
952  LOCK(cs_wallet);
953  if (!mapAddressBook.count(address))
954  return true;
955  }
956  return false;
957 }

960 {

962  return n ? n : nTimeReceived;
963 }
964 
965 int CWalletTx::GetRequestCount() const
966 {
967  // Returns -1 if it wasn't being tracked
968  int nRequests = -1;
969  {
970  LOCK(pwallet->cs_wallet);
971  if (IsCoinBase() || IsCoinStake())
972  {
973  // Generated block
974  if (hashBlock != 0)
975  {
976  map<uint256, int>::const_iterator mi = pwallet->mapRequestCount.find(hashBlock);
977  if (mi != pwallet->mapRequestCount.end())
978  nRequests = (*mi).second;
979  }
980  }
981  else
982  {
983  // Did anyone request this transaction?
984  map<uint256, int>::const_iterator mi = pwallet->mapRequestCount.find(GetHash());
985  if (mi != pwallet->mapRequestCount.end())
986  {
987  nRequests = (*mi).second;
988 
989  // How about the block it's in?
990  if (nRequests == 0 && hashBlock != 0)
991  {
992  map<uint256, int>::const_iterator mi = pwallet->mapRequestCount.find(hashBlock);
993  if (mi != pwallet->mapRequestCount.end())
994  nRequests = (*mi).second;
995  else
996  nRequests = 1; // If it's in someone else's block it must have got out
997  }
998  }
999  }
1000  }
1001  return nRequests;
1002 }
1003 
1004 void CWalletTx::GetAmounts(list<pair<CTxDestination, int64_t> >& listReceived,
1005  list<pair<CTxDestination, int64_t> >& listSent, CAmount& nFee, string& strSentAccount, const isminefilter& filter) const
1006 {
1007  LOCK(pwallet->cs_wallet);
1008  nFee = 0;
1009  listReceived.clear();
1010  listSent.clear();
1011  strSentAccount = strFromAccount;
1012 
1013  // Compute fee:
1014  CAmount nDebit = GetDebit(filter);
1015  if (nDebit > 0) // debit>0 means we signed/sent this transaction
1016  {
1017  CAmount nValueOut = GetValueOut();
1018  nFee = nDebit - nValueOut;
1019  }
1020 
1021  // Sent/received.
1022  BOOST_FOREACH(const CTxOut& txout, vout)
1023  {
1024  // Skip special stake out
1025  if (txout.scriptPubKey.empty())
1026  continue;
1027 
1028  isminetype fIsMine = pwallet->IsMine(txout);
1029  // Only need to handle txouts if AT LEAST one of these is true:
1030  // 1) they debit from us (sent)
1031  // 2) the output is to us (received)
1032  if (nDebit > 0)
1033  {
1034  // Don't report 'change' txouts
1035  // TXNOTE: CoinControl possible fix related... with HD wallet we need to report change?
1036  if (pwallet->IsChange(txout))
1037  continue;
1038  }
1039  else if (!(fIsMine & filter))
1040  continue;
1041 
1042  // In either case, we need to get the destination address
1043  CTxDestination address;
1044  if (!ExtractDestination(txout.scriptPubKey, address))
1045  {
1046  LogPrintf("CWalletTx::GetAmounts: Unknown transaction type found, txid %s\n",
1047  this->GetHash().ToString());
1048  address = CNoDestination();
1049  }
1050 
1051  // If we are debited by the transaction, add the output as a "sent" entry
1052  if (nDebit > 0)
1053  listSent.push_back(make_pair(address, txout.nValue));
1054 
1055  // If we are receiving the output, add it as a "received" entry
1056  if (fIsMine & filter)
1057  listReceived.push_back(make_pair(address, txout.nValue));
1058  }
1059 
1060 }
1061 
1062 void CWalletTx::GetAccountAmounts(const string& strAccount, CAmount& nReceived,
1063  CAmount& nSent, CAmount& nFee, const isminefilter& filter) const
1064 {
1065 
1066  nReceived = nSent = nFee = 0;
1067 
1068  CAmount allFee;
1069  string strSentAccount;
1070  list<pair<CTxDestination, int64_t> > listReceived;
1071  list<pair<CTxDestination, int64_t> > listSent;
1072  GetAmounts(listReceived, listSent, allFee, strSentAccount, filter);
1073 
1074  if (strAccount == strSentAccount)
1075  {
1076  BOOST_FOREACH(const PAIRTYPE(CTxDestination,int64_t)& s, listSent)
1077  nSent += s.second;
1078  nFee = allFee;
1079  }
1080  {
1081  LOCK(pwallet->cs_wallet);
1082  BOOST_FOREACH(const PAIRTYPE(CTxDestination,int64_t)& r, listReceived)
1083  {
1084  if (pwallet->mapAddressBook.count(r.first))
1085  {
1086  map<CTxDestination, string>::const_iterator mi = pwallet->mapAddressBook.find(r.first);
1087  if (mi != pwallet->mapAddressBook.end() && (*mi).second == strAccount)
1088  nReceived += r.second;
1089  }
1090  else if (strAccount.empty())
1091  {
1092  nReceived += r.second;
1093  }
1094  }
1095  }
1096 }
1097 
1098 void CWalletTx::AddSupportingTransactions(CTxDB& txdb)
1099 {
1100  vtxPrev.clear();
1101 
1102  const int COPY_DEPTH = 3;
1103  if (SetMerkleBranch() < COPY_DEPTH)
1104  {
1105  vector<uint256> vWorkQueue;
1106  BOOST_FOREACH(const CTxIn& txin, vin)
1107  vWorkQueue.push_back(txin.prevout.hash);
1108 
1109  // This critsect is OK because txdb is already open
1110  {
1111  LOCK(pwallet->cs_wallet);
1112  map<uint256, const CMerkleTx*> mapWalletPrev;
1113  set<uint256> setAlreadyDone;
1114  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < vWorkQueue.size(); i++)
1115  {
1116  uint256 hash = vWorkQueue[i];
1117  if (setAlreadyDone.count(hash))
1118  continue;
1119  setAlreadyDone.insert(hash);
1120 
1121  CMerkleTx tx;
1122  map<uint256, CWalletTx>::const_iterator mi = pwallet->mapWallet.find(hash);
1123  if (mi != pwallet->mapWallet.end())
1124  {
1125  tx = (*mi).second;
1126  BOOST_FOREACH(const CMerkleTx& txWalletPrev, (*mi).second.vtxPrev)
1127  mapWalletPrev[txWalletPrev.GetHash()] = &txWalletPrev;
1128  }
1129  else if (mapWalletPrev.count(hash))
1130  {
1131  tx = *mapWalletPrev[hash];
1132  }
1133  else if (txdb.ReadDiskTx(hash, tx))
1134  {
1135  ;
1136  }
1137  else
1138  {
1139  LogPrintf("ERROR: AddSupportingTransactions() : unsupported transaction\n");
1140  continue;
1141  }
1142 
1143  int nDepth = tx.SetMerkleBranch();
1144  vtxPrev.push_back(tx);
1145 
1146  if (nDepth < COPY_DEPTH)
1147  {
1148  BOOST_FOREACH(const CTxIn& txin, tx.vin)
1149  vWorkQueue.push_back(txin.prevout.hash);
1150  }
1151  }
1152  }
1153  }
1154 
1155  reverse(vtxPrev.begin(), vtxPrev.end());
1156 }
1157 
1158 bool CWalletTx::WriteToDisk()
1159 {
1160  return CWalletDB(pwallet->strWalletFile).WriteTx(GetHash(), *this);
1161 }
1162 
1163 // Scan the block chain (starting in pindexStart) for transactions
1164 // from or to us. If fUpdate is true, found transactions that already
1165 // exist in the wallet will be updated.
1166 int CWallet::ScanForWalletTransactions(CBlockIndex* pindexStart, bool fUpdate)
1167 {
1168  int ret = 0;
1169 
1170  CBlockIndex* pindex = pindexStart;
1171  {
1172  LOCK2(cs_main, cs_wallet);
1173  while (pindex)
1174  {
1175  // no need to read and scan block, if block was created before
1176  // our wallet birthday (as adjusted for block time variability)
1177  if (nTimeFirstKey && (pindex->nTime < (nTimeFirstKey - 7200))) {
1178  pindex = pindex->pnext;
1179  continue;
1180  }
1181 
1182  CBlock block;
1183  block.ReadFromDisk(pindex, true);
1184  BOOST_FOREACH(CTransaction& tx, block.vtx)
1185  {
1186  if (AddToWalletIfInvolvingMe(tx, &block, fUpdate))
1187  ret++;
1188  }
1189  pindex = pindex->pnext;
1190  }
1191  }
1192  return ret;
1193 }
1194 
1195 void CWallet::ReacceptWalletTransactions()
1196 {
1197  CTxDB txdb("r");
1198  bool fRepeat = true;
1199  while (fRepeat)
1200  {
1201  LOCK2(cs_main, cs_wallet);
1202  fRepeat = false;
1203  vector<CDiskTxPos> vMissingTx;
1204  BOOST_FOREACH(PAIRTYPE(const uint256, CWalletTx)& item, mapWallet)
1205  {
1206  const uint256& wtxid = item.first;
1207  CWalletTx& wtx = item.second;
1208  assert(wtx.GetHash() == wtxid);
1209 
1210  int nDepth = wtx.GetDepthInMainChain();
1211 
1212  if (!wtx.IsCoinBase() && nDepth < 0)
1213  {
1214  // Try to add to memory pool
1215  LOCK(mempool.cs);
1216  wtx.AcceptToMemoryPool(false);
1217  }
1218  if ((wtx.IsCoinBase() && wtx.IsSpent(0)) || (wtx.IsCoinStake() && wtx.IsSpent(1)))
1219  {
1220  continue;
1221  }
1222 
1223  CTxIndex txindex;
1224  bool fUpdated = false;
1225  if (txdb.ReadTxIndex(wtx.GetHash(), txindex))
1226  {
1227  // Update fSpent if a tx got spent somewhere else by a copy of wallet.dat
1228  if (txindex.vSpent.size() != wtx.vout.size())
1229  {
1230  LogPrintf("ERROR: ReacceptWalletTransactions() : txindex.vSpent.size() %u != wtx.vout.size() %u\n", txindex.vSpent.size(), wtx.vout.size());
1231  continue;
1232  }
1233  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < txindex.vSpent.size(); i++)
1234  {
1235  if (wtx.IsSpent(i))
1236  continue;
1237  if (!txindex.vSpent[i].IsNull() && IsMine(wtx.vout[i]))
1238  {
1239  wtx.MarkSpent(i);
1240  fUpdated = true;
1241  vMissingTx.push_back(txindex.vSpent[i]);
1242  }
1243  }
1244  if (fUpdated)
1245  {
1246  LogPrintf("ReacceptWalletTransactions found spent coin %s ION %s\n", FormatMoney(wtx.GetCredit(ISMINE_ALL)), wtx.GetHash().ToString());
1247  wtx.MarkDirty();
1248  wtx.WriteToDisk();
1249  }
1250  }
1251  else
1252  {
1253  // Re-accept any txes of ours that aren't already in a block
1254  if (!(wtx.IsCoinBase() || wtx.IsCoinStake()))
1255  wtx.AcceptWalletTransaction(txdb);
1256  }
1257  }
1258  if (!vMissingTx.empty())
1259  {
1260  // TODO: optimize this to scan just part of the block chain?
1261  if (ScanForWalletTransactions(pindexGenesisBlock))
1262  fRepeat = true; // Found missing transactions: re-do re-accept.
1263  }
1264  }
1265 }
1266 
1267 void CWalletTx::RelayWalletTransaction(CTxDB& txdb, std::string strCommand)
1268 {
1269  if (!(IsCoinBase() || IsCoinStake()))
1270  {
1271  if (GetDepthInMainChain() == 0) {
1272  uint256 hash = GetHash();
1273  if(strCommand == "txlreq"){
1274  LogPrintf("Relaying txlreq %s\n", hash.ToString());
1275  mapTxLockReq.insert(make_pair(hash, ((CTransaction)*this)));
1276  CreateNewLock(((CTransaction)*this));
1277  RelayTransactionLockReq((CTransaction)*this, true);
1278  } else {
1279  LogPrintf("Relaying wtx %s\n", hash.ToString());
1280  RelayTransaction((CTransaction)*this, hash);
1281  }
1282  }
1283  }
1284 }
1285 
1286 void CWalletTx::RelayWalletTransaction(std::string strCommand)
1287 {
1288  CTxDB txdb("r");
1289  RelayWalletTransaction(txdb, strCommand);
1290 }

1292 set<uint256> CWalletTx::GetConflicts() const
1293 {
1294  set<uint256> result;
1295  if (pwallet != NULL)
1296  {
1297  uint256 myHash = GetHash();
1298  result = pwallet->GetConflicts(myHash);
1299  result.erase(myHash);
1300  }
1301  return result;
1302 }

1304 void CWallet::ResendWalletTransactions(bool fForce)
1305 {
1306  if (!fForce)
1307  {
1308  // Do this infrequently and randomly to avoid giving away
1309  // that these are our transactions.
1310  static int64_t nNextTime;
1311  if (GetTime() < nNextTime)
1312  return;
1313  bool fFirst = (nNextTime == 0);
1314  nNextTime = GetTime() + GetRand(30 * 60);
1315  if (fFirst)
1316  return;
1317 
1318  // Only do it if there's been a new block since last time
1319  static int64_t nLastTime;
1320  if (nTimeBestReceived < nLastTime)
1321  return;
1322  nLastTime = GetTime();
1323  }
1324 
1325  // Rebroadcast any of our txes that aren't in a block yet
1326  LogPrintf("ResendWalletTransactions()\n");
1327  CTxDB txdb("r");
1328  {
1329  LOCK(cs_wallet);
1330  // Sort them in chronological order
1331  multimap<unsigned int, CWalletTx*> mapSorted;
1332  BOOST_FOREACH(PAIRTYPE(const uint256, CWalletTx)& item, mapWallet)
1333  {
1334  CWalletTx& wtx = item.second;
1335  // Don't rebroadcast until it's had plenty of time that
1336  // it should have gotten in already by now.
1337  if (fForce || nTimeBestReceived - (int64_t)wtx.nTimeReceived > 5 * 60)
1338  mapSorted.insert(make_pair(wtx.nTimeReceived, &wtx));
1339  }
1340  BOOST_FOREACH(PAIRTYPE(const unsigned int, CWalletTx*)& item, mapSorted)
1341  {
1342  CWalletTx& wtx = *item.second;
1343  wtx.RelayWalletTransaction(txdb);
1344  }
1345  }
1346 }

1351 
1352

1356 // Actions
1357 //

1441 // Note: calculated including unconfirmed,
1442 // that's ok as long as we use it for informational purposes only
1443 double CWallet::GetAverageAnonymizedRounds() const
1444 {
1445  if(fLiteMode) return 0;
1446 
1447  double fTotal = 0;
1448  double fCount = 0;
1449 
1450  {
1451  LOCK2(cs_main, cs_wallet);
1452  for (map<uint256, CWalletTx>::const_iterator it = mapWallet.begin(); it != mapWallet.end(); ++it)
1453  {
1454  const CWalletTx* pcoin = &(*it).second;
1455 
1456  uint256 hash = (*it).first;
1457 
1458  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < pcoin->vout.size(); i++) {
1459 
1460  CTxIn vin = CTxIn(hash, i);
1461 
1462  if(IsSpent(hash, i) || IsMine(pcoin->vout[i]) != ISMINE_SPENDABLE || !IsDenominated(vin)) continue;
1463 
1464  int rounds = GetInputStashedsendRounds(vin);
1465  fTotal += (float)rounds;
1466  fCount += 1;
1467  }
1468  }
1469  }
1470 
1471  if(fCount == 0) return 0;
1472 
1473  return fTotal/fCount;
1474 }

1612 // populate vCoins with vector of available COutputs.
1613 void CWallet::AvailableCoins(vector<COutput>& vCoins, bool fOnlyConfirmed, const CCoinControl *coinControl, AvailableCoinsType coin_type, bool useIX) const
1614 {
1615  vCoins.clear();
1616 
1617  {
1618  LOCK2(cs_main, cs_wallet);
1619  for (map<uint256, CWalletTx>::const_iterator it = mapWallet.begin(); it != mapWallet.end(); ++it)
1620  {
1621  const CWalletTx* pcoin = &(*it).second;
1622 
1623  if (!IsFinalTx(*pcoin))
1624  continue;
1625 
1626  if (fOnlyConfirmed && !pcoin->IsTrusted())
1627  continue;
1628 
1629  if (pcoin->IsCoinBase() && pcoin->GetBlocksToMaturity() > 0)
1630  continue;
1631 
1632  if(pcoin->IsCoinStake() && pcoin->GetBlocksToMaturity() > 0)
1633  continue;
1634 
1635  int nDepth = pcoin->GetDepthInMainChain(false);
1636  if (nDepth <= 0) // TXNOTE: coincontrol fix / ignore 0 confirm
1637  continue;
1638 
1639  // do not use IX for inputs that have less then 6 blockchain confirmations
1640  if (useIX && nDepth < 10)
1641  continue;
1642 
1643  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < pcoin->vout.size(); i++) {
1644  bool found = false;
1645  if(coin_type == ONLY_DENOMINATED) {
1646  found = IsDenominatedAmount(pcoin->vout[i].nValue);
1647  } else if(coin_type == ONLY_NOT10000IFMN) {
1648  found = !(fMasterNode && pcoin->vout[i].nValue == GetMNCollateral(pindexBest->nHeight)*COIN);
1649  } else if (coin_type == ONLY_NONDENOMINATED_NOT10000IFMN){
1650  if (IsCollateralAmount(pcoin->vout[i].nValue)) continue; // do not use collateral amounts
1651  found = !IsDenominatedAmount(pcoin->vout[i].nValue);
1652  if(found && fMasterNode) found = pcoin->vout[i].nValue != GetMNCollateral(pindexBest->nHeight)*COIN; // do not use Hot MN funds
1653  } else {
1654  found = true;
1655  }
1656  if(!found) continue;
1657 
1658  isminetype mine = IsMine(pcoin->vout[i]);
1659  if (!(pcoin->IsSpent(i)) && mine != ISMINE_NO &&
1660  !IsLockedCoin((*it).first, i) && pcoin->vout[i].nValue > 0 &&
1661  (!coinControl || !coinControl->HasSelected() || coinControl->IsSelected((*it).first, i)))
1662  {
1663  vCoins.push_back(COutput(pcoin, i, nDepth, mine & ISMINE_SPENDABLE));
1664  }
1665  }
1666  }
1667  }
1668 }

1671 {

1693  if (nDepth <= 0) // TXNOTE: coincontrol fix / ignore 0 confirm

1706  } else if (coin_type == ONLY_NONDENOMINATED_NOT10000IFMN){

1718  !IsLockedCoin((*it).first, i) && pcoin->vout[i].nValue > 0 &&
1719  (!coinControl || !coinControl->HasSelected() || coinControl->IsSelected((*it).first, i)))
1720  vCoins.push_back(COutput(pcoin, i, nDepth, (mine & ISMINE_SPENDABLE) != ISMINE_NO));

1726 void CWallet::AvailableCoinsForStaking(vector<COutput>& vCoins, unsigned int nSpendTime) const
1727 {
1728  vCoins.clear();
1729 
1730  {
1731  LOCK2(cs_main, cs_wallet);
1732  for (map<uint256, CWalletTx>::const_iterator it = mapWallet.begin(); it != mapWallet.end(); ++it)
1733  {
1734  const CWalletTx* pcoin = &(*it).second;
1735 
1736  int nDepth = pcoin->GetDepthInMainChain();
1737  if (nDepth < 1)
1738  continue;
1739 
1740  if (nDepth < DetermineCoinbaseMaturity())
1741  {
1742  continue;
1743  }
1744  else
1745  {
1746  // Filtering by tx timestamp instead of block timestamp may give false positives but never false negatives
1747  if (pcoin->nTime + nStakeMinAge > nSpendTime)
1748  continue;
1749  }
1750 
1751  if (pcoin->GetBlocksToMaturity() > 0)
1752  continue;
1753 
1754  bool found = false;
1755  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < pcoin->vout.size(); i++){
1756  if (IsDenominatedAmount(pcoin->vout[i].nValue)){
1757 
1758  //LogPrintf("CWallet::AvailableCoinsForStaking - Found denominated amounts.\n");
1759  found = true;
1760  break;
1761  }
1762  if (pcoin->vout[i].nValue == GetMNCollateral(pindexBest->nHeight)*COIN){
1763 
1764  //LogPrintf("CWallet::AvailableCoinsForStaking - Found Masternode collateral.\n");
1765  found = true;
1766  break;
1767  }
1768  if (IsCollateralAmount(pcoin->vout[i].nValue)){
1769 
1770  //LogPrintf("CWallet::AvailableCoinsForStaking - Found Collateral amount.\n");
1771  found = true;
1772  break;
1773  }
1774  }
1775 
1776  if(found) continue;
1777 
1778  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < pcoin->vout.size(); i++) {
1779  isminetype mine = IsMine(pcoin->vout[i]);
1780  if (!(pcoin->IsSpent(i)) && mine != ISMINE_NO && pcoin->vout[i].nValue >= nMinimumInputValue)
1781  vCoins.push_back(COutput(pcoin, i, nDepth, mine & ISMINE_SPENDABLE));
1782  }
1783  }
1784  }
1785 }
1786 
1787 static void ApproximateBestSubset(vector<pair<int64_t, pair<const CWalletTx*,unsigned int> > >vValue, int64_t nTotalLower, int64_t nTargetValue,
1788  vector<char>& vfBest, int64_t& nBest, int iterations = 1000)
1789 {
1790  vector<char> vfIncluded;
1791 
1792  vfBest.assign(vValue.size(), true);
1793  nBest = nTotalLower;
1794 
1795  seed_insecure_rand();
1796 
1797  for (int nRep = 0; nRep < iterations && nBest != nTargetValue; nRep++)
1798  {
1799  vfIncluded.assign(vValue.size(), false);
1800  int64_t nTotal = 0;
1801  bool fReachedTarget = false;
1802  for (int nPass = 0; nPass < 2 && !fReachedTarget; nPass++)
1803  {
1804  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < vValue.size(); i++)
1805  {
1806  //The solver here uses a randomized algorithm,
1807  //the randomness serves no real security purpose but is just
1808  //needed to prevent degenerate behavior and it is important
1809  //that the rng fast. We do not use a constant random sequence,
1810  //because there may be some privacy improvement by making
1811  //the selection random.
1812  if (nPass == 0 ? insecure_rand()&1 : !vfIncluded[i])
1813  {
1814  nTotal += vValue[i].first;
1815  vfIncluded[i] = true;
1816  if (nTotal >= nTargetValue)
1817  {
1818  fReachedTarget = true;
1819  if (nTotal < nBest)
1820  {
1821  nBest = nTotal;
1822  vfBest = vfIncluded;
1823  }
1824  nTotal -= vValue[i].first;
1825  vfIncluded[i] = false;
1826  }
1827  }
1828  }
1829  }
1830  }
1831 }
1832 
1833 // TODO: find appropriate place for this sort function
1834 // move denoms down
1835 bool less_then_denom (const COutput& out1, const COutput& out2)
1836 {
1837  const CWalletTx *pcoin1 = out1.tx;
1838  const CWalletTx *pcoin2 = out2.tx;
1839 
1840  bool found1 = false;
1841  bool found2 = false;
1842  BOOST_FOREACH(int64_t d, stashedSendDenominations) // loop through predefined denoms
1843  {
1844  if(pcoin1->vout[out1.i].nValue == d) found1 = true;
1845  if(pcoin2->vout[out2.i].nValue == d) found2 = true;
1846  }
1847  return (!found1 && found2);
1848 }
1849 
1850 bool CWallet::SelectCoinsMinConf(int64_t nTargetValue, unsigned int nSpendTime, int nConfMine, int nConfTheirs, vector<COutput> vCoins, set<pair<const CWalletTx*,unsigned int> >& setCoinsRet, int64_t& nValueRet) const
1851 {
1852  setCoinsRet.clear();
1853  nValueRet = 0;
1854 
1855  // List of values less than target
1856  pair<int64_t, pair<const CWalletTx*,unsigned int> > coinLowestLarger;
1857  coinLowestLarger.first = std::numeric_limits<int64_t>::max();
1858  coinLowestLarger.second.first = NULL;
1859  vector<pair<int64_t, pair<const CWalletTx*,unsigned int> > > vValue;
1860  int64_t nTotalLower = 0;
1861 
1862  random_shuffle(vCoins.begin(), vCoins.end(), GetRandInt);
1863 
1864  // move denoms down on the list
1865  sort(vCoins.begin(), vCoins.end(), less_then_denom);
1866 
1867  // try to find nondenom first to prevent unneeded spending of mixed coins
1868  for (unsigned int tryDenom = 0; tryDenom < 2; tryDenom++)
1869  {
1870  if (fDebug) LogPrint("selectcoins", "tryDenom: %d\n", tryDenom);
1871  vValue.clear();
1872  nTotalLower = 0;
1873 
1874  BOOST_FOREACH(const COutput &output, vCoins)
1875  {
1876  if (!output.fSpendable)
1877  continue;
1878 
1879  const CWalletTx *pcoin = output.tx;
1880 
1881  if (output.nDepth < (pcoin->IsFromMe(ISMINE_ALL) ? nConfMine : nConfTheirs))
1882  continue;
1883 
1884  int i = output.i;
1885 
1886  // Follow the timestamp rules
1887  if (pcoin->nTime > nSpendTime)
1888  continue;
1889 
1890  int64_t n = pcoin->vout[i].nValue;
1891 
1892  if (tryDenom == 0 && IsDenominatedAmount(n)) continue; // we don't want denom values on first run
1893 
1894  pair<int64_t,pair<const CWalletTx*,unsigned int> > coin = make_pair(n,make_pair(pcoin, i));
1895 
1896  if (n == nTargetValue)
1897  {
1898  setCoinsRet.insert(coin.second);
1899  nValueRet += coin.first;
1900  return true;
1901  }
1902  else if (n < nTargetValue + CENT)
1903  {
1904  vValue.push_back(coin);
1905  nTotalLower += n;
1906  }
1907  else if (n < coinLowestLarger.first)
1908  {
1909  coinLowestLarger = coin;
1910  }
1911  }
1912 
1913  if (nTotalLower == nTargetValue)
1914  {
1915  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < vValue.size(); ++i)
1916  {
1917  setCoinsRet.insert(vValue[i].second);
1918  nValueRet += vValue[i].first;
1919  }
1920  return true;
1921  }
1922 
1923  if (nTotalLower < nTargetValue)
1924  {
1925  if (coinLowestLarger.second.first == NULL)
1926  return false;
1927  setCoinsRet.insert(coinLowestLarger.second);
1928  nValueRet += coinLowestLarger.first;
1929  return true;
1930  }
1931 
1932  // Solve subset sum by stochastic approximation
1933  sort(vValue.rbegin(), vValue.rend(), CompareValueOnly());
1934  vector<char> vfBest;
1935  int64_t nBest;
1936 
1937  ApproximateBestSubset(vValue, nTotalLower, nTargetValue, vfBest, nBest, 1000);
1938  if (nBest != nTargetValue && nTotalLower >= nTargetValue + CENT)
1939  ApproximateBestSubset(vValue, nTotalLower, nTargetValue + CENT, vfBest, nBest, 1000);
1940 
1941  // If we have a bigger coin and (either the stochastic approximation didn't find a good solution,
1942  // or the next bigger coin is closer), return the bigger coin
1943  if (coinLowestLarger.second.first &&
1944  ((nBest != nTargetValue && nBest < nTargetValue + CENT) || coinLowestLarger.first <= nBest))
1945  {
1946  setCoinsRet.insert(coinLowestLarger.second);
1947  nValueRet += coinLowestLarger.first;
1948  }
1949  else {
1950  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < vValue.size(); i++)
1951  if (vfBest[i])
1952  {
1953  setCoinsRet.insert(vValue[i].second);
1954  nValueRet += vValue[i].first;
1955  }
1956 
1957  LogPrint("selectcoins", "SelectCoins() best subset: ");
1958  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < vValue.size(); i++)
1959  if (vfBest[i])
1960  LogPrint("selectcoins", "%s ", FormatMoney(vValue[i].first));
1961  LogPrint("selectcoins", "total %s\n", FormatMoney(nBest));
1962  }
1963 
1964  return true;
1965  }
1966  return false;
1967 }

1969 bool CWallet::SelectCoins(int64_t nTargetValue, unsigned int nSpendTime, set<pair<const CWalletTx*,unsigned int> >& setCoinsRet, int64_t& nValueRet, const CCoinControl* coinControl, AvailableCoinsType coin_type, bool useIX) const
1970 {
1971  vector<COutput> vCoins;
1972  AvailableCoins(vCoins, true, coinControl, coin_type, useIX);
1973 
1974  // coin control -> return all selected outputs (we want all selected to go into the transaction for sure)
1975  if (coinControl && coinControl->HasSelected())
1976  {
1977  BOOST_FOREACH(const COutput& out, vCoins)
1978  {
1979  if(!out.fSpendable)
1980  continue;
1981 
1982  if(coin_type == ONLY_DENOMINATED) {
1983  CTxIn vin = CTxIn(out.tx->GetHash(),out.i);
1984  int rounds = GetInputStashedsendRounds(vin);
1985  // make sure it's actually anonymized
1986  if(rounds < nStashedsendRounds) continue;
1987  }
1988 
1989  nValueRet += out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue;
1990  setCoinsRet.insert(make_pair(out.tx, out.i));
1991  }
1992  return (nValueRet >= nTargetValue);
1993  }
1994 
1995  //if we're doing only denominated, we need to round up to the nearest .1TX
1996  if(coin_type == ONLY_DENOMINATED) {
1997  // Make outputs by looping through denominations, from large to small
1998  BOOST_FOREACH(int64_t v, stashedSendDenominations)
1999  {
2000  BOOST_FOREACH(const COutput& out, vCoins)
2001  {
2002  if(out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue == v //make sure it's the denom we're looking for
2003  && nValueRet + out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue < nTargetValue + (0.1*COIN)+100 //round the amount up to .1TX over
2004  ){
2005  CTxIn vin = CTxIn(out.tx->GetHash(),out.i);
2006  int rounds = GetInputStashedsendRounds(vin);
2007  // make sure it's actually anonymized
2008  if(rounds < nStashedsendRounds) continue;
2009  nValueRet += out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue;
2010  setCoinsRet.insert(make_pair(out.tx, out.i));
2011  }
2012  }
2013  }
2014  return (nValueRet >= nTargetValue);
2015  }
2016 
2017  boost::function<bool (const CWallet*, int64_t, unsigned int, int, int, std::vector<COutput>, std::set<std::pair<const CWalletTx*,unsigned int> >&, int64_t&)> f = &CWallet::SelectCoinsMinConf;
2018 
2019  return (f(this, nTargetValue, nSpendTime, 1, 10, vCoins, setCoinsRet, nValueRet) ||
2020  f(this, nTargetValue, nSpendTime, 1, 1, vCoins, setCoinsRet, nValueRet) ||
2021  f(this, nTargetValue, nSpendTime, 0, 1, vCoins, setCoinsRet, nValueRet));
2022 }

2024 // Select some coins without random shuffle or best subset approximation
2025 bool CWallet::SelectCoinsForStaking(int64_t nTargetValue, unsigned int nSpendTime, set<pair<const CWalletTx*,unsigned int> >& setCoinsRet, int64_t& nValueRet) const
2026 {
2027  vector<COutput> vCoins;
2028  AvailableCoinsForStaking(vCoins, nSpendTime);
2029 
2030  setCoinsRet.clear();
2031  nValueRet = 0;
2032 
2033  BOOST_FOREACH(COutput output, vCoins)
2034  {
2035  if(!output.fSpendable)
2036  continue;
2037 
2038  const CWalletTx *pcoin = output.tx;
2039  int i = output.i;
2040 
2041  // Stop if we've chosen enough inputs
2042  if (nValueRet >= nTargetValue)
2043  break;
2044 
2045  int64_t n = pcoin->vout[i].nValue;
2046 
2047  pair<int64_t,pair<const CWalletTx*,unsigned int> > coin = make_pair(n,make_pair(pcoin, i));
2048 
2049  if (n >= nTargetValue)
2050  {
2051  // If input value is greater or equal to target then simply insert
2052  // it into the current subset and exit
2053  setCoinsRet.insert(coin.second);
2054  nValueRet += coin.first;
2055  break;
2056  }
2057  else if (n < nTargetValue + CENT)
2058  {
2059  setCoinsRet.insert(coin.second);
2060  nValueRet += coin.first;
2061  }
2062  }
2063 
2064  return true;
2065 }

2068 {

2070  const COutput& t2) const
2071  {
2072  return t1.Priority() > t2.Priority();
2073  }

2076 bool CWallet::SelectCoinsByDenominations(int nDenom, CAmount nValueMin, CAmount nValueMax, std::vector<CTxIn>& vCoinsRet, std::vector<COutput>& vCoinsRet2, int64_t& nValueRet, int nStashedsendRoundsMin, int nStashedsendRoundsMax)
2077 {
2078  vCoinsRet.clear();
2079  nValueRet = 0;
2080 
2081  vCoinsRet2.clear();
2082  vector<COutput> vCoins;
2083  AvailableCoins(vCoins, true, NULL, ONLY_DENOMINATED);
2084 
2085  std::random_shuffle(vCoins.rbegin(), vCoins.rend());
2086 
2087  //keep track of each denomination that we have
2088  bool fFound1000 = false;
2089  bool fFound100 = false;
2090  bool fFound10 = false;
2091  bool fFound1 = false;
2092  bool fFoundDot1 = false;
2093 
2094  //Check to see if any of the denomination are off, in that case mark them as fulfilled
2095  if(!(nDenom & (1 << 0))) fFound1000 = true;
2096  if(!(nDenom & (1 << 1))) fFound100 = true;
2097  if(!(nDenom & (1 << 2))) fFound10 = true;
2098  if(!(nDenom & (1 << 3))) fFound1 = true;
2099  if(!(nDenom & (1 << 4))) fFoundDot1 = true;
2100 
2101  BOOST_FOREACH(const COutput& out, vCoins)
2102  {
2103  // masternode-like input should not be selected by AvailableCoins now anyway
2104  //if(out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue == 1000*COIN) continue;
2105  if(nValueRet + out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue <= nValueMax){
2106  bool fAccepted = false;
2107 
2108  // Function returns as follows:
2109  //
2110  // bit 0 - 1000ION+1 ( bit on if present )
2111  // bit 1 - 100ION+1
2112  // bit 2 - 10ION+1
2113  // bit 3 - 1ION+1
2114  // bit 4 - .1ION+1
2115 
2116  CTxIn vin = CTxIn(out.tx->GetHash(),out.i);
2117 
2118  int rounds = GetInputStashedsendRounds(vin);
2119  if(rounds >= nStashedsendRoundsMax) continue;
2120  if(rounds < nStashedsendRoundsMin) continue;
2121 
2122  if(fFound1000 && fFound100 && fFound10 && fFound1 && fFoundDot1){ //if fulfilled
2123  //we can return this for submission
2124  if(nValueRet >= nValueMin){
2125  //random reduce the max amount we'll submit for anonymity
2126  nValueMax -= (rand() % (nValueMax/5));
2127  //on average use 50% of the inputs or less
2128  int r = (rand() % (int)vCoins.size());
2129  if((int)vCoinsRet.size() > r) return true;
2130  }
2131  //Denomination criterion has been met, we can take any matching denominations
2132  if((nDenom & (1 << 0)) && out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue == ((1000*COIN) +1000000)) {fAccepted = true;}
2133  else if((nDenom & (1 << 1)) && out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue == ((100*COIN) +100000)) {fAccepted = true;}
2134  else if((nDenom & (1 << 2)) && out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue == ((10*COIN) +10000)) {fAccepted = true;}
2135  else if((nDenom & (1 << 3)) && out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue == ((1*COIN) +1000)) {fAccepted = true;}
2136  else if((nDenom & (1 << 4)) && out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue == ((.1*COIN) +100)) {fAccepted = true;}
2137  } else {
2138  //Criterion has not been satisfied, we will only take 1 of each until it is.
2139  if((nDenom & (1 << 0)) && out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue == ((1000*COIN) +1000000)) {fAccepted = true; fFound1000 = true;}
2140  else if((nDenom & (1 << 1)) && out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue == ((100*COIN) +100000)) {fAccepted = true; fFound100 = true;}
2141  else if((nDenom & (1 << 2)) && out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue == ((10*COIN) +10000)) {fAccepted = true; fFound10 = true;}
2142  else if((nDenom & (1 << 3)) && out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue == ((1*COIN) +1000)) {fAccepted = true; fFound1 = true;}
2143  else if((nDenom & (1 << 4)) && out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue == ((.1*COIN) +100)) {fAccepted = true; fFoundDot1 = true;}
2144  }
2145  if(!fAccepted) continue;
2146 
2147  vin.prevPubKey = out.tx->vout[out.i].scriptPubKey; // the inputs PubKey
2148  nValueRet += out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue;
2149  vCoinsRet.push_back(vin);
2150  vCoinsRet2.push_back(out);
2151  }
2152  }
2153 
2154  return (nValueRet >= nValueMin && fFound1000 && fFound100 && fFound10 && fFound1 && fFoundDot1);
2155 }

2157 bool CWallet::SelectCoinsStashed(CAmount nValueMin, CAmount nValueMax, std::vector<CTxIn>& setCoinsRet, CAmount& nValueRet, int nStashedsendRoundsMin, int nStashedsendRoundsMax) const
2158 {
2159  CCoinControl *coinControl=NULL;
2160 
2161  setCoinsRet.clear();
2162  nValueRet = 0;
2163 
2164  vector<COutput> vCoins;
2165  AvailableCoins(vCoins, true, coinControl, nStashedsendRoundsMin < 0 ? ONLY_NONDENOMINATED_NOT10000IFMN : ONLY_DENOMINATED);
2166 
2167  set<pair<const CWalletTx*,unsigned int> > setCoinsRet2;
2168 
2169  //order the array so fees are first, then denominated money, then the rest.
2170  sort(vCoins.rbegin(), vCoins.rend(), CompareByPriority());
2171 
2172  //the first thing we get is a fee input, then we'll use as many denominated as possible. then the rest
2173  BOOST_FOREACH(const COutput& out, vCoins)
2174  {
2175  //do not allow inputs less than 1 CENT
2176  if(out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue < CENT) continue;
2177  //do not allow collaterals to be selected
2178  if(IsCollateralAmount(out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue)) continue;
2179  if(fMasterNode && out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue == GetMNCollateral(pindexBest->nHeight)*COIN) continue; //masternode input
2180 
2181  if(nValueRet + out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue <= nValueMax){
2182  CTxIn vin = CTxIn(out.tx->GetHash(),out.i);
2183 
2184  int rounds = GetInputStashedsendRounds(vin);
2185  if(rounds >= nStashedsendRoundsMax) continue;
2186  if(rounds < nStashedsendRoundsMin) continue;
2187 
2188  vin.prevPubKey = out.tx->vout[out.i].scriptPubKey; // the inputs PubKey
2189  nValueRet += out.tx->vout[out.i].nValue;
2190  setCoinsRet.push_back(vin);
2191  setCoinsRet2.insert(make_pair(out.tx, out.i));
2192  }
2193  }
2194 
2195  // if it's more than min, we're good to return
2196  if(nValueRet >= nValueMin) return true;
2197 
2198  return false;
2199 }

2278 bool CWallet::CreateCollateralTransaction(CTransaction& txCollateral, std::string& strReason)
2279 {
2280  /*
2281  To doublespend a collateral transaction, it will require a fee higher than this. So there's
2282  still a significant cost.
2283  */
2284  CAmount nFeeRet = 0.001*COIN;
2285 
2286  txCollateral.vin.clear();
2287  txCollateral.vout.clear();
2288  txCollateral.nTime = GetAdjustedTime();
2289 
2290  CReserveKey reservekey(this);
2291  CAmount nValueIn2 = 0;
2292  std::vector<CTxIn> vCoinsCollateral;
2293 
2294  if (!SelectCoinsCollateral(vCoinsCollateral, nValueIn2))
2295  {
2296  strReason = "Error: Stashedsend requires a collateral transaction and could not locate an acceptable input!";
2297  return false;
2298  }
2299 
2300  // make our change address
2301  CScript scriptChange;
2302  CPubKey vchPubKey;
2303  assert(reservekey.GetReservedKey(vchPubKey)); // should never fail, as we just unlocked
2304  scriptChange = GetScriptForDestination(vchPubKey.GetID());
2305  reservekey.KeepKey();
2306 
2307  BOOST_FOREACH(CTxIn v, vCoinsCollateral)
2308  txCollateral.vin.push_back(v);
2309 
2310  if(nValueIn2 - STASHEDSEND_COLLATERAL - nFeeRet > 0) {
2311  //pay collateral charge in fees
2312  CTxOut vout3 = CTxOut(nValueIn2 - STASHEDSEND_COLLATERAL, scriptChange);
2313  txCollateral.vout.push_back(vout3);
2314  }
2315 
2316  int vinNumber = 0;
2317  BOOST_FOREACH(CTxIn v, txCollateral.vin) {
2318  if(!SignSignature(*this, v.prevPubKey, txCollateral, vinNumber, int(SIGHASH_ALL|SIGHASH_ANYONECANPAY))) {
2319  BOOST_FOREACH(CTxIn v, vCoinsCollateral)
2320  UnlockCoin(v.prevout);
2321 
2322  strReason = "CStashedsendPool::Sign - Unable to sign collateral transaction! \n";
2323  return false;
2324  }
2325  vinNumber++;
2326  }
2327 
2328  return true;
2329 }

2348 bool CWallet::CreateTransaction(const vector<pair<CScript, int64_t> >& vecSend, CWalletTx& wtxNew, CReserveKey& reservekey,
2349  int64_t& nFeeRet, int32_t& nChangePos, std::string& strFailReason, const CCoinControl* coinControl,
2350  AvailableCoinsType coin_type, bool useIX)
2351 {
2352 
2353  CAmount nValue = 0;
2354 
2355  BOOST_FOREACH (const PAIRTYPE(CScript, int64_t)& s, vecSend)
2356  {
2357  if (nValue < 0)
2358  {
2359  strFailReason = _("Transaction amounts must be positive");
2360  return false;
2361  }
2362  nValue += s.second;
2363  }
2364  if (vecSend.empty() || nValue < 0)
2365  {
2366  strFailReason = _("Transaction amounts must be positive");
2367  return false;
2368  }
2369 
2370  wtxNew.fTimeReceivedIsTxTime = true;
2371  wtxNew.BindWallet(this);
2372 
2373  {
2374  // txdb must be opened before the mapWallet lock
2375  CTxDB txdb("r");
2376  LOCK2(cs_main, cs_wallet);
2377  {
2378  nFeeRet = nTransactionFee;
2379  if(useIX) nFeeRet = max(CENT, nFeeRet);
2380  while (true)
2381  {
2382  wtxNew.vin.clear();
2383  wtxNew.vout.clear();
2384  wtxNew.fFromMe = true;
2385 
2386  int64_t nTotalValue = nValue + nFeeRet;
2387  double dPriority = 0;
2388  // vouts to the payees
2389  BOOST_FOREACH (const PAIRTYPE(CScript, int64_t)& s, vecSend)
2390  {
2391  CTxOut txout(s.second, s.first);
2392  bool fOpReturn = false;
2393 
2394  if(txout.IsNull() || (!txout.IsEmpty() && txout.nValue == 0))
2395  {
2396  txnouttype whichType;
2397  vector<valtype> vSolutions;
2398  if (!Solver(txout.scriptPubKey, whichType, vSolutions))
2399  {
2400  strFailReason = _("Invalid scriptPubKey");
2401  return false;
2402  }
2403  if(whichType == TX_NONSTANDARD)
2404  {
2405  strFailReason = _("Unknown transaction type");
2406  return false;
2407  }
2408  if(whichType == TX_NULL_DATA)
2409  fOpReturn = true;
2410  }
2411 
2412  if (!fOpReturn && txout.IsDust(MIN_RELAY_TX_FEE))
2413  {
2414  strFailReason = _("Transaction amount too small");
2415  return false;
2416  }
2417  wtxNew.vout.push_back(txout);
2418  }
2419 
2420  // Choose coins to use
2421  set<pair<const CWalletTx*,unsigned int> > setCoins;
2422  CAmount nValueIn = 0;
2423 
2424  if (!SelectCoins(nTotalValue, wtxNew.nTime, setCoins, nValueIn, coinControl, coin_type, useIX))
2425  {
2426  if(coin_type == ALL_COINS) {
2427  strFailReason = _(" Insufficient funds.");
2428  } else if (coin_type == ONLY_NOT10000IFMN) {
2429  strFailReason = _(" Unable to locate enough Stashedsend non-denominated funds for this transaction.");
2430  } else if (coin_type == ONLY_NONDENOMINATED_NOT10000IFMN ) {
2431  strFailReason = _(" Unable to locate enough Stashedsend non-denominated funds for this transaction that are not equal 1000 ION.");
2432  } else {
2433  strFailReason = _(" Unable to locate enough Stashedsend denominated funds for this transaction.");
2434  strFailReason += _(" Stashedsend uses exact denominated amounts to send funds, you might simply need to anonymize some more coins.");
2435  }
2436 
2437  if(useIX){
2438  strFailReason += _(" InstantX requires inputs with at least 10 confirmations, you might need to wait a few minutes and try again.");
2439  }
2440  return false;
2441  }
2442  BOOST_FOREACH(PAIRTYPE(const CWalletTx*, unsigned int) pcoin, setCoins)
2443  {
2444  int64_t nCredit = pcoin.first->vout[pcoin.second].nValue;
2445  //The coin age after the next block (depth+1) is used instead of the current,
2446  //reflecting an assumption the user would accept a bit more delay for
2447  //a chance at a free transaction.
2448  //But mempool inputs might still be in the mempool, so their age stays 0
2449  int age = pcoin.first->GetDepthInMainChain();
2450  if (age != 0)
2451  age += 1;
2452  dPriority += (double)nCredit * age;
2453  }
2454 
2455  int64_t nChange = nValueIn - nValue - nFeeRet;
2456 
2457  //over pay for denominated transactions
2458  if(coin_type == ONLY_DENOMINATED)
2459  {
2460  nFeeRet += nChange;
2461  nChange = 0;
2462  wtxNew.mapValue["DS"] = "1";
2463  }
2464 
2465  if (nChange > 0)
2466  {
2467  // Fill a vout to ourself
2468  // TODO: pass in scriptChange instead of reservekey so
2469  // change transaction isn't always pay-to-ion-address
2470  CScript scriptChange;
2471 
2472  // coin control: send change to custom address
2473  if (coinControl && !boost::get<CNoDestination>(&coinControl->destChange))
2474  scriptChange.SetDestination(coinControl->destChange);
2475 
2476  // no coin control: send change to newly generated address
2477  else
2478  {
2479  // Note: We use a new key here to keep it from being obvious which side is the change.
2480  // The drawback is that by not reusing a previous key, the change may be lost if a
2481  // backup is restored, if the backup doesn't have the new private key for the change.
2482  // If we reused the old key, it would be possible to add code to look for and
2483  // rediscover unknown transactions that were written with keys of ours to recover
2484  // post-backup change.
2485 
2486  // Reserve a new key pair from key pool
2487  CPubKey vchPubKey;
2488  bool ret;
2489  ret = reservekey.GetReservedKey(vchPubKey);
2490  assert(ret); // should never fail, as we just unlocked
2491 
2492  scriptChange.SetDestination(vchPubKey.GetID());
2493  }
2494 
2495  CTxOut newTxOut(nChange, scriptChange);
2496 
2497  // Never create dust outputs; if we would, just
2498  // add the dust to the fee.
2499  if (newTxOut.IsDust(MIN_RELAY_TX_FEE))
2500  {
2501  nFeeRet += nChange;
2502  nChange = 0;
2503  reservekey.ReturnKey();
2504  }
2505  else
2506  {
2507  // Insert change txn at random position:
2508  vector<CTxOut>::iterator position = wtxNew.vout.begin()+GetRandInt(wtxNew.vout.size()+1);
2509  wtxNew.vout.insert(position, newTxOut);
2510  }
2511  }
2512  else
2513  reservekey.ReturnKey();
2514 
2515  // Fill vin
2516  //
2517  // Note how the sequence number is set to max()-1 so that the
2518  // nLockTime set above actually works.
2519  BOOST_FOREACH(const PAIRTYPE(const CWalletTx*,unsigned int)& coin, setCoins)
2520  wtxNew.vin.push_back(CTxIn(coin.first->GetHash(),coin.second));
2521 
2522  // Sign
2523  int nIn = 0;
2524  BOOST_FOREACH(const PAIRTYPE(const CWalletTx*,unsigned int)& coin, setCoins)
2525  if (!SignSignature(*this, *coin.first, wtxNew, nIn++))
2526  {
2527  strFailReason = _(" Signing transaction failed");
2528  return false;
2529  }
2530 
2531  // Limit size
2532  unsigned int nBytes = ::GetSerializeSize(*(CTransaction*)&wtxNew, SER_NETWORK, PROTOCOL_VERSION);
2533  if (nBytes >= MAX_STANDARD_TX_SIZE)
2534  {
2535  strFailReason = _(" Transaction too large");
2536  return false;
2537  }
2538  dPriority = wtxNew.ComputePriority(dPriority, nBytes);
2539 
2540  // Check that enough fee is included
2541  int64_t nPayFee = nTransactionFee * (1 + (int64_t)nBytes / 1000);
2542  bool fAllowFree = AllowFree(dPriority);
2543  int64_t nMinFee = GetMinFee(wtxNew, nBytes, fAllowFree, GMF_SEND);
2544 
2545  if (nFeeRet < max(nPayFee, nMinFee))
2546  {
2547  nFeeRet = max(nPayFee, nMinFee);
2548  if(useIX) nFeeRet = max(CENT, nFeeRet);
2549  continue;
2550  }
2551  // Fill vtxPrev by copying from previous transactions vtxPrev
2552  wtxNew.AddSupportingTransactions(txdb);
2553  wtxNew.fTimeReceivedIsTxTime = true;
2554 
2555  break;
2556  }
2557  }
2558  }
2559  return true;
2560 }
2561 
2562 bool CWallet::CreateTransaction(CScript scriptPubKey, CAmount nValue, std::string& sNarr, CWalletTx& wtxNew, CReserveKey& reservekey, int64_t& nFeeRet, const CCoinControl* coinControl)
2563 {
2564  vector< pair<CScript, int64_t> > vecSend;
2565  vecSend.push_back(make_pair(scriptPubKey, nValue));
2566 
2567  if (sNarr.length() > 0)
2568  {
2569  std::vector<uint8_t> vNarr(sNarr.c_str(), sNarr.c_str() + sNarr.length());
2570  std::vector<uint8_t> vNDesc;
2571 
2572  vNDesc.resize(2);
2573  vNDesc[0] = 'n';
2574  vNDesc[1] = 'p';
2575 
2576  CScript scriptN = CScript() << OP_RETURN << vNDesc << OP_RETURN << vNarr;
2577 
2578  vecSend.push_back(make_pair(scriptN, 0));
2579  }
2580 
2581  // -- CreateTransaction won't place change between value and narr output.
2582  // narration output will be for preceding output
2583 
2584  int nChangePos;
2585  std::string strFailReason;
2586  bool rv = CreateTransaction(vecSend, wtxNew, reservekey, nFeeRet, nChangePos, strFailReason, coinControl);
2587  if(!strFailReason.empty())
2588  {
2589  LogPrintf("CreateTransaction(): ERROR: %s\n", strFailReason);
2590  return false;
2591  }
2592  // -- narration will be added to mapValue later in FindStealthTransactions From CommitTransaction
2593  return rv;
2594 }

2601 
2602  if (GenerateRandomSecret(scan_secret) != 0

2636  printf("\n");
2637  };
2638

2641  sxAddr.scan_pubkey = scan_pubkey;

2652 bool CWallet::AddStealthAddress(CStealthAddress& sxAddr)
2653 {
2654  LOCK(cs_wallet);
2655 
2656  // must add before changing spend_secret
2657  stealthAddresses.insert(sxAddr);
2658 
2659  bool fOwned = sxAddr.scan_secret.size() == ec_secret_size;
2660 
2661 
2662 
2663  if (fOwned)
2664  {
2665  // -- owned addresses can only be added when wallet is unlocked
2666  if (IsLocked())
2667  {
2668  printf("Error: CWallet::AddStealthAddress wallet must be unlocked.\n");
2669  stealthAddresses.erase(sxAddr);
2670  return false;
2671  };
2672 
2673  if (IsCrypted())
2674  {
2675  std::vector<unsigned char> vchCryptedSecret;
2676  CSecret vchSecret;
2677  vchSecret.resize(32);
2678  memcpy(&vchSecret[0], &sxAddr.spend_secret[0], 32);
2679 
2680  uint256 iv = Hash(sxAddr.spend_pubkey.begin(), sxAddr.spend_pubkey.end());
2681  if (!EncryptSecret(vMasterKey, vchSecret, iv, vchCryptedSecret))
2682  {
2683  printf("Error: Failed encrypting stealth key %s\n", sxAddr.Encoded().c_str());
2684  stealthAddresses.erase(sxAddr);
2685  return false;
2686  };
2687  sxAddr.spend_secret = vchCryptedSecret;
2688  };
2689  };
2690 
2691 
2692  bool rv = CWalletDB(strWalletFile).WriteStealthAddress(sxAddr);
2693 
2694  if (rv)
2695  NotifyAddressBookChanged(this, sxAddr, sxAddr.label, fOwned, CT_NEW);
2696 
2697  return rv;
2698 }

2700 bool CWallet::UnlockStealthAddresses(const CKeyingMaterial& vMasterKeyIn)
2701 {
2702  // -- decrypt spend_secret of stealth addresses
2703  std::set<CStealthAddress>::iterator it;
2704  for (it = stealthAddresses.begin(); it != stealthAddresses.end(); ++it)
2705  {
2706  if (it->scan_secret.size() < 32)
2707  continue; // stealth address is not owned
2708 
2709  // -- CStealthAddress are only sorted on spend_pubkey
2710  CStealthAddress &sxAddr = const_cast<CStealthAddress&>(*it);
2711 
2712  if (fDebug)
2713  printf("Decrypting stealth key %s\n", sxAddr.Encoded().c_str());
2714 
2715  CSecret vchSecret;
2716  uint256 iv = Hash(sxAddr.spend_pubkey.begin(), sxAddr.spend_pubkey.end());
2717  if(!DecryptSecret(vMasterKeyIn, sxAddr.spend_secret, iv, vchSecret)
2718  || vchSecret.size() != 32)
2719  {
2720  printf("Error: Failed decrypting stealth key %s\n", sxAddr.Encoded().c_str());
2721  continue;
2722  };
2723 
2724  ec_secret testSecret;
2725  memcpy(&testSecret.e[0], &vchSecret[0], 32);
2726  ec_point pkSpendTest;
2727 
2728  if (SecretToPublicKey(testSecret, pkSpendTest) != 0
2729  || pkSpendTest != sxAddr.spend_pubkey)
2730  {
2731  printf("Error: Failed decrypting stealth key, public key mismatch %s\n", sxAddr.Encoded().c_str());
2732  continue;
2733  };
2734 
2735  sxAddr.spend_secret.resize(32);
2736  memcpy(&sxAddr.spend_secret[0], &vchSecret[0], 32);
2737  };
2738 
2739  CryptedKeyMap::iterator mi = mapCryptedKeys.begin();
2740  for (; mi != mapCryptedKeys.end(); ++mi)
2741  {
2742  CPubKey &pubKey = (*mi).second.first;
2743  std::vector<unsigned char> &vchCryptedSecret = (*mi).second.second;
2744  if (vchCryptedSecret.size() != 0)
2745  continue;
2746 
2747  CKeyID ckid = pubKey.GetID();
2748  CIonAddress addr(ckid);
2749 
2750  StealthKeyMetaMap::iterator mi = mapStealthKeyMeta.find(ckid);
2751  if (mi == mapStealthKeyMeta.end())
2752  {
2753  printf("Error: No metadata found to add secret for %s\n", addr.ToString().c_str());
2754  continue;
2755  };
2756 
2757  CStealthKeyMetadata& sxKeyMeta = mi->second;
2758 
2759  CStealthAddress sxFind;
2760  sxFind.scan_pubkey = sxKeyMeta.pkScan.Raw();
2761 
2762  std::set<CStealthAddress>::iterator si = stealthAddresses.find(sxFind);
2763  if (si == stealthAddresses.end())
2764  {
2765  printf("No stealth key found to add secret for %s\n", addr.ToString().c_str());
2766  continue;
2767  };
2768 
2769  if (fDebug)
2770  printf("Expanding secret for %s\n", addr.ToString().c_str());
2771 
2772  ec_secret sSpendR;
2773  ec_secret sSpend;
2774  ec_secret sScan;
2775 
2776  if (si->spend_secret.size() != ec_secret_size
2777  || si->scan_secret.size() != ec_secret_size)
2778  {
2779  printf("Stealth address has no secret key for %s\n", addr.ToString().c_str());
2780  continue;
2781  }
2782  memcpy(&sScan.e[0], &si->scan_secret[0], ec_secret_size);
2783  memcpy(&sSpend.e[0], &si->spend_secret[0], ec_secret_size);
2784 
2785  ec_point pkEphem = sxKeyMeta.pkEphem.Raw();
2786  if (StealthSecretSpend(sScan, pkEphem, sSpend, sSpendR) != 0)
2787  {
2788  printf("StealthSecretSpend() failed.\n");
2789  continue;
2790  };
2791 
2792  ec_point pkTestSpendR;
2793  if (SecretToPublicKey(sSpendR, pkTestSpendR) != 0)
2794  {
2795  printf("SecretToPublicKey() failed.\n");
2796  continue;
2797  };
2798 
2799  CSecret vchSecret;
2800  vchSecret.resize(ec_secret_size);
2801 
2802  memcpy(&vchSecret[0], &sSpendR.e[0], ec_secret_size);
2803  CKey ckey;
2804 
2805  try {
2806  ckey.Set(vchSecret.begin(), vchSecret.end(), true);
2807  //ckey.SetSecret(vchSecret, true);
2808  } catch (std::exception& e) {
2809  printf("ckey.SetSecret() threw: %s.\n", e.what());
2810  continue;
2811  };
2812 
2813  CPubKey cpkT = ckey.GetPubKey();
2814 
2815  if (!cpkT.IsValid())
2816  {
2817  printf("cpkT is invalid.\n");
2818  continue;
2819  };
2820 
2821  if (cpkT != pubKey)
2822  {
2823  printf("Error: Generated secret does not match.\n");
2824  continue;
2825  };
2826 
2827  if (!ckey.IsValid())
2828  {
2829  printf("Reconstructed key is invalid.\n");
2830  continue;
2831  };
2832 
2833  if (fDebug)
2834  {
2835  CKeyID keyID = cpkT.GetID();
2836  CIonAddress coinAddress(keyID);
2837  printf("Adding secret to key %s.\n", coinAddress.ToString().c_str());
2838  };
2839 
2840  if (!AddKey(ckey))
2841  {
2842  printf("AddKey failed.\n");
2843  continue;
2844  };
2845 
2846  if (!CWalletDB(strWalletFile).EraseStealthKeyMeta(ckid))
2847  printf("EraseStealthKeyMeta failed for %s\n", addr.ToString().c_str());
2848  };
2849  return true;
2850 }

2852 bool CWallet::UpdateStealthAddress(std::string &addr, std::string &label, bool addIfNotExist)
2853 {
2854  if (fDebug)
2855  printf("UpdateStealthAddress %s\n", addr.c_str());
2856 
2857 
2858  CStealthAddress sxAddr;
2859 
2860  if (!sxAddr.SetEncoded(addr))
2861  return false;
2862 
2863  std::set<CStealthAddress>::iterator it;
2864  it = stealthAddresses.find(sxAddr);
2865 
2866  ChangeType nMode = CT_UPDATED;
2867  CStealthAddress sxFound;
2868  if (it == stealthAddresses.end())
2869  {
2870  if (addIfNotExist)
2871  {
2872  sxFound = sxAddr;
2873  sxFound.label = label;
2874  stealthAddresses.insert(sxFound);
2875  nMode = CT_NEW;
2876  } else
2877  {
2878  printf("UpdateStealthAddress %s, not in set\n", addr.c_str());
2879  return false;
2880  };
2881  } else
2882  {
2883  sxFound = const_cast<CStealthAddress&>(*it);
2884 
2885  if (sxFound.label == label)
2886  {
2887  // no change
2888  return true;
2889  };
2890 
2891  it->label = label; // update in .stealthAddresses
2892 
2893  if (sxFound.scan_secret.size() == ec_secret_size)
2894  {
2895  printf("UpdateStealthAddress: todo - update owned stealth address.\n");
2896  return false;
2897  };
2898  };
2899 
2900  sxFound.label = label;
2901 
2902  if (!CWalletDB(strWalletFile).WriteStealthAddress(sxFound))
2903  {
2904  printf("UpdateStealthAddress(%s) Write to db failed.\n", addr.c_str());
2905  return false;
2906  };
2907 
2908  bool fOwned = sxFound.scan_secret.size() == ec_secret_size;
2909  NotifyAddressBookChanged(this, sxFound, sxFound.label, fOwned, nMode);
2910 
2911  return true;
2912 }
