2914 bool CWallet::CreateStealthTransaction(CScript scriptPubKey, CAmount nValue, std::vector<uint8_t>& P, std::vector<uint8_t>& narr, std::string& sNarr, CWalletTx& wtxNew, CReserveKey& reservekey, int64_t& nFeeRet, const CCoinControl* coinControl)
2915 {
2916  vector< pair<CScript, int64_t> > vecSend;
2917  vecSend.push_back(make_pair(scriptPubKey, nValue));
2918 
2919  CScript scriptP = CScript() << OP_RETURN << P;
2920  if (narr.size() > 0)
2921  scriptP = scriptP << OP_RETURN << narr;
2922 
2923  vecSend.push_back(make_pair(scriptP, 0));
2924 
2925  // -- shuffle inputs, change output won't mix enough as it must be not fully random for plantext narrations
2926  std::random_shuffle(vecSend.begin(), vecSend.end());
2927 
2928  int nChangePos;
2929  std::string strFailReason;
2930  bool rv = CreateTransaction(vecSend, wtxNew, reservekey, nFeeRet, nChangePos, strFailReason, coinControl);
2931  if(!strFailReason.empty())
2932  LogPrintf("CreateStealthTransaction(): %s\n", strFailReason);
2933 
2934  // -- the change txn is inserted in a random pos, check here to match narr to output
2935  if (rv && narr.size() > 0)
2936  {
2937  for (unsigned int k = 0; k < wtxNew.vout.size(); ++k)
2938  {
2939  if (wtxNew.vout[k].scriptPubKey != scriptPubKey
2940  || wtxNew.vout[k].nValue != nValue)
2941  continue;
2942 
2943  char key[64];
2944  if (snprintf(key, sizeof(key), "n_%u", k) < 1)
2945  {
2946  printf("CreateStealthTransaction(): Error creating narration key.");
2947  break;
2948  };
2949  wtxNew.mapValue[key] = sNarr;
2950  break;
2951  };
2952  };
2953 
2954  return rv;
2955 }

2957 string CWallet::SendStealthMoney(CScript scriptPubKey, CAmount nValue, std::vector<uint8_t>& P, std::vector<uint8_t>& narr, std::string& sNarr, CWalletTx& wtxNew, bool fAskFee)
2958 {
2959  CReserveKey reservekey(this);
2960  CAmount nFeeRequired;
2961 
2962  if (IsLocked())
2963  {
2964  string strError = _("Error: Wallet locked, unable to create transaction ");
2965  LogPrintf("SendStealthMoney() : %s\n", strError.c_str());
2966  return strError;
2967  }
2968  if (fWalletUnlockStakingOnly)
2969  {
2970  string strError = _("Error: Wallet unlocked for staking only, unable to create transaction.");
2971  LogPrintf("SendStealthMoney() : %s\n", strError.c_str());
2972  return strError;
2973  }
2974  if (!CreateStealthTransaction(scriptPubKey, nValue, P, narr, sNarr, wtxNew, reservekey, nFeeRequired))
2975  {
2976  string strError;
2977  if (nValue + nFeeRequired > GetBalance())
2978  strError = strprintf(_("Error: This transaction requires a transaction fee of at least %s because of its amount, complexity, or use of recently received funds "), FormatMoney(nFeeRequired).c_str());
2979  else
2980  strError = "Failed to Create transaction";
2981 
2982  LogPrintf("SendStealthMoney() : %s\n", strError.c_str());
2983  return strError;
2984  }
2985 
2986  if (fAskFee && !uiInterface.ThreadSafeAskFee(nFeeRequired, _("Sending...")))
2987  return "ABORTED";
2988 
2989  if (!CommitTransaction(wtxNew, reservekey))
2990  return _("Error: The transaction was rejected. This might happen if some of the coins in your wallet were already spent, such as if you used a copy of wallet.dat and coins were spent in the copy but not marked as spent here.");
2991 
2992  return "";
2993 }

2995 bool CWallet::SendStealthMoneyToDestination(CStealthAddress& sxAddress, CAmount nValue, std::string& sNarr, CWalletTx& wtxNew, std::string& sError, bool fAskFee)
2996 {
2997  // -- Check amount
2998  if (nValue <= 0)
2999  {
3000  sError = "Invalid amount";
3001  return false;
3002  };
3003  if (nValue + nTransactionFee + (1) > GetBalance())
3004  {
3005  sError = "Insufficient funds";
3006  return false;
3007  };
3008 
3009 
3010  ec_secret ephem_secret;
3011  ec_secret secretShared;
3012  ec_point pkSendTo;
3013  ec_point ephem_pubkey;
3014 
3015  if (GenerateRandomSecret(ephem_secret) != 0)
3016  {
3017  sError = "GenerateRandomSecret failed.";
3018  return false;
3019  };
3020 
3021  if (StealthSecret(ephem_secret, sxAddress.scan_pubkey, sxAddress.spend_pubkey, secretShared, pkSendTo) != 0)
3022  {
3023  sError = "Could not generate receiving public key.";
3024  return false;
3025  };
3026 
3027  CPubKey cpkTo(pkSendTo);
3028  if (!cpkTo.IsValid())
3029  {
3030  sError = "Invalid public key generated.";
3031  return false;
3032  };
3033 
3034  CKeyID ckidTo = cpkTo.GetID();
3035 
3036  CIonAddress addrTo(ckidTo);
3037 
3038  if (SecretToPublicKey(ephem_secret, ephem_pubkey) != 0)
3039  {
3040  sError = "Could not generate ephem public key.";
3041  return false;
3042  };
3043 
3044  if (fDebug)
3045  {
3046  LogPrintf("Stealth send to generated pubkey %" PRIszu": %s\n", pkSendTo.size(), HexStr(pkSendTo).c_str());
3047  LogPrintf("hash %s\n", addrTo.ToString().c_str());
3048  LogPrintf("ephem_pubkey %" PRIszu": %s\n", ephem_pubkey.size(), HexStr(ephem_pubkey).c_str());
3049  };
3050 
3051  std::vector<unsigned char> vchNarr;
3052  if (sNarr.length() > 0)
3053  {
3054  SecMsgCrypter crypter;
3055  crypter.SetKey(&secretShared.e[0], &ephem_pubkey[0]);
3056 
3057  if (!crypter.Encrypt((uint8_t*)&sNarr[0], sNarr.length(), vchNarr))
3058  {
3059  sError = "Narration encryption failed.";
3060  return false;
3061  };
3062 
3063  if (vchNarr.size() > 48)
3064  {
3065  sError = "Encrypted narration is too long.";
3066  return false;
3067  };
3068  };
3069 
3070  // -- Parse Ion address
3071  CScript scriptPubKey;
3072  scriptPubKey.SetDestination(addrTo.Get());
3073 
3074  if ((sError = SendStealthMoney(scriptPubKey, nValue, ephem_pubkey, vchNarr, sNarr, wtxNew, fAskFee)) != "")
3075  return false;
3076 
3077 
3078  return true;
3079 }

3081 bool CWallet::FindStealthTransactions(const CTransaction& tx, mapValue_t& mapNarr)
3082 {
3083  if (fDebug)
3084  LogPrintf("FindStealthTransactions() tx: %s\n", tx.GetHash().GetHex().c_str());
3085 
3086  mapNarr.clear();
3087 
3088  LOCK(cs_wallet);
3089  ec_secret sSpendR;
3090  ec_secret sSpend;
3091  ec_secret sScan;
3092  ec_secret sShared;
3093 
3094  ec_point pkExtracted;
3095 
3096  std::vector<uint8_t> vchEphemPK;
3097  std::vector<uint8_t> vchDataB;
3098  std::vector<uint8_t> vchENarr;
3099  opcodetype opCode;
3100  char cbuf[256];
3101 
3102  int32_t nOutputIdOuter = -1;
3103  BOOST_FOREACH(const CTxOut& txout, tx.vout)
3104  {
3105  nOutputIdOuter++;
3106  // -- for each OP_RETURN need to check all other valid outputs
3107 
3108  //printf("txout scriptPubKey %s\n", txout.scriptPubKey.ToString().c_str());
3109  CScript::const_iterator itTxA = txout.scriptPubKey.begin();
3110 
3111  if (!txout.scriptPubKey.GetOp(itTxA, opCode, vchEphemPK)
3112  || opCode != OP_RETURN)
3113  continue;
3114  else
3115  if (!txout.scriptPubKey.GetOp(itTxA, opCode, vchEphemPK)
3116  || vchEphemPK.size() != 33)
3117  {
3118  // -- look for plaintext narrations
3119  if (vchEphemPK.size() > 1
3120  && vchEphemPK[0] == 'n'
3121  && vchEphemPK[1] == 'p')
3122  {
3123  if (txout.scriptPubKey.GetOp(itTxA, opCode, vchENarr)
3124  && opCode == OP_RETURN
3125  && txout.scriptPubKey.GetOp(itTxA, opCode, vchENarr)
3126  && vchENarr.size() > 0)
3127  {
3128  std::string sNarr = std::string(vchENarr.begin(), vchENarr.end());
3129 
3130  snprintf(cbuf, sizeof(cbuf), "n_%d", nOutputIdOuter-1); // plaintext narration always matches preceding value output
3131  mapNarr[cbuf] = sNarr;
3132  } else
3133  {
3134  printf("Warning: FindStealthTransactions() tx: %s, Could not extract plaintext narration.\n", tx.GetHash().GetHex().c_str());
3135  };
3136  }
3137 
3138  continue;
3139  }
3140 
3141  int32_t nOutputId = -1;
3142  nStealth++;
3143  BOOST_FOREACH(const CTxOut& txoutB, tx.vout)
3144  {
3145  nOutputId++;
3146 
3147  if (&txoutB == &txout)
3148  continue;
3149 
3150  bool txnMatch = false; // only 1 txn will match an ephem pk
3151  //printf("txoutB scriptPubKey %s\n", txoutB.scriptPubKey.ToString().c_str());
3152 
3153  CTxDestination address;
3154  if (!ExtractDestination(txoutB.scriptPubKey, address))
3155  continue;
3156 
3157  if (address.type() != typeid(CKeyID))
3158  continue;
3159 
3160  CKeyID ckidMatch = boost::get<CKeyID>(address);
3161 
3162  if (HaveKey(ckidMatch)) // no point checking if already have key
3163  continue;
3164 
3165  std::set<CStealthAddress>::iterator it;
3166  for (it = stealthAddresses.begin(); it != stealthAddresses.end(); ++it)
3167  {
3168  if (it->scan_secret.size() != ec_secret_size)
3169  continue; // stealth address is not owned
3170 
3171  //printf("it->Encodeded() %s\n", it->Encoded().c_str());
3172  memcpy(&sScan.e[0], &it->scan_secret[0], ec_secret_size);
3173 
3174  if (StealthSecret(sScan, vchEphemPK, it->spend_pubkey, sShared, pkExtracted) != 0)
3175  {
3176  printf("StealthSecret failed.\n");
3177  continue;
3178  };
3179  //printf("pkExtracted %"PRIszu": %s\n", pkExtracted.size(), HexStr(pkExtracted).c_str());
3180 
3181  CPubKey cpkE(pkExtracted);
3182 
3183  if (!cpkE.IsValid())
3184  continue;
3185  CKeyID ckidE = cpkE.GetID();
3186 
3187  if (ckidMatch != ckidE)
3188  continue;
3189 
3190  if (fDebug)
3191  printf("Found stealth txn to address %s\n", it->Encoded().c_str());
3192 
3193  if (IsLocked())
3194  {
3195  if (fDebug)
3196  printf("Wallet is locked, adding key without secret.\n");
3197 
3198  // -- add key without secret
3199  std::vector<uint8_t> vchEmpty;
3200  AddCryptedKey(cpkE, vchEmpty);
3201  CKeyID keyId = cpkE.GetID();
3202  CIonAddress coinAddress(keyId);
3203  std::string sLabel = it->Encoded();
3204  SetAddressBookName(keyId, sLabel);
3205 
3206  CPubKey cpkEphem(vchEphemPK);
3207  CPubKey cpkScan(it->scan_pubkey);
3208  CStealthKeyMetadata lockedSkMeta(cpkEphem, cpkScan);
3209 
3210  if (!CWalletDB(strWalletFile).WriteStealthKeyMeta(keyId, lockedSkMeta))
3211  printf("WriteStealthKeyMeta failed for %s\n", coinAddress.ToString().c_str());
3212 
3213  mapStealthKeyMeta[keyId] = lockedSkMeta;
3214  nFoundStealth++;
3215  } else
3216  {
3217  if (it->spend_secret.size() != ec_secret_size)
3218  continue;
3219  memcpy(&sSpend.e[0], &it->spend_secret[0], ec_secret_size);
3220 
3221 
3222  if (StealthSharedToSecretSpend(sShared, sSpend, sSpendR) != 0)
3223  {
3224  printf("StealthSharedToSecretSpend() failed.\n");
3225  continue;
3226  };
3227 
3228  ec_point pkTestSpendR;
3229  if (SecretToPublicKey(sSpendR, pkTestSpendR) != 0)
3230  {
3231  printf("SecretToPublicKey() failed.\n");
3232  continue;
3233  };
3234 
3235  CSecret vchSecret;
3236  vchSecret.resize(ec_secret_size);
3237 
3238  memcpy(&vchSecret[0], &sSpendR.e[0], ec_secret_size);
3239  CKey ckey;
3240 
3241  try {
3242  ckey.Set(vchSecret.begin(), vchSecret.end(), true);
3243  //ckey.SetSecret(vchSecret, true);
3244  } catch (std::exception& e) {
3245  printf("ckey.SetSecret() threw: %s.\n", e.what());
3246  continue;
3247  };
3248 
3249  CPubKey cpkT = ckey.GetPubKey();
3250  if (!cpkT.IsValid())
3251  {
3252  printf("cpkT is invalid.\n");
3253  continue;
3254  };
3255 
3256  if (!ckey.IsValid())
3257  {
3258  printf("Reconstructed key is invalid.\n");
3259  continue;
3260  };
3261 
3262  CKeyID keyID = cpkT.GetID();
3263  if (fDebug)
3264  {
3265  CIonAddress coinAddress(keyID);
3266  printf("Adding key %s.\n", coinAddress.ToString().c_str());
3267  };
3268 
3269  if (!AddKey(ckey))
3270  {
3271  printf("AddKey failed.\n");
3272  continue;
3273  };
3274 
3275  std::string sLabel = it->Encoded();
3276  SetAddressBookName(keyID, sLabel);
3277  nFoundStealth++;
3278  };
3279 
3280  if (txout.scriptPubKey.GetOp(itTxA, opCode, vchENarr)
3281  && opCode == OP_RETURN
3282  && txout.scriptPubKey.GetOp(itTxA, opCode, vchENarr)
3283  && vchENarr.size() > 0)
3284  {
3285  SecMsgCrypter crypter;
3286  crypter.SetKey(&sShared.e[0], &vchEphemPK[0]);
3287  std::vector<uint8_t> vchNarr;
3288  if (!crypter.Decrypt(&vchENarr[0], vchENarr.size(), vchNarr))
3289  {
3290  printf("Decrypt narration failed.\n");
3291  continue;
3292  };
3293  std::string sNarr = std::string(vchNarr.begin(), vchNarr.end());
3294 
3295  snprintf(cbuf, sizeof(cbuf), "n_%d", nOutputId);
3296  mapNarr[cbuf] = sNarr;
3297  };
3298 
3299  txnMatch = true;
3300  break;
3301  };
3302  if (txnMatch)
3303  break;
3304  };
3305  };
3306 
3307  return true;
3308 };

3310 uint64_t CWallet::GetStakeWeight() const
3311 {
3312  // Choose coins to use
3313  int64_t nBalance = GetBalance();
3314 
3315  if (nBalance <= nReserveBalance)
3316  return 0;
3317 
3318  vector<const CWalletTx*> vwtxPrev;
3319 
3320  set<pair<const CWalletTx*,unsigned int> > setCoins;
3321  CAmount nValueIn = 0;
3322 
3323  if (!SelectCoinsForStaking(nBalance - nReserveBalance, GetTime(), setCoins, nValueIn))
3324  return 0;
3325 
3326  if (setCoins.empty())
3327  return 0;
3328 
3329  uint64_t nWeight = 0;
3330 
3331  CTxDB txdb("r");
3332 
3333  LOCK2(cs_main, cs_wallet);
3334 
3335  BOOST_FOREACH(PAIRTYPE(const CWalletTx*, unsigned int) pcoin, setCoins)
3336  {
3337  CTxIndex txindex;
3338  if (pcoin.first->GetDepthInMainChain() >= DetermineCoinbaseMaturity())
3339  nWeight += pcoin.first->vout[pcoin.second].nValue;
3340  }
3341 
3342  return nWeight;
3343 }

3345 bool CWallet::CreateCoinStake(const CKeyStore& keystore, unsigned int nBits, int64_t nSearchInterval, CAmount nFees, CTransaction& txNew, CKey& key)
3346 {
3347  CBlockIndex* pindexPrev = pindexBest;
3348  uint256 bnTargetPerCoinDay;
3349  bnTargetPerCoinDay.SetCompact(nBits);
3350 
3351  txNew.vin.clear();
3352  txNew.vout.clear();
3353 
3354  // Mark coin stake transaction
3355  CScript scriptEmpty;
3356  scriptEmpty.clear();
3357  txNew.vout.push_back(CTxOut(0, scriptEmpty));
3358 
3359  // Choose coins to use
3360  int64_t nBalance = GetBalance();
3361 
3362  if (nBalance <= nReserveBalance)
3363  return false;
3364 
3365  vector<const CWalletTx*> vwtxPrev;
3366 
3367  set<pair<const CWalletTx*,unsigned int> > setCoins;
3368  CAmount nValueIn = 0;
3369 
3370  // Select coins with suitable depth
3371  if (!SelectCoinsForStaking(nBalance - nReserveBalance, txNew.nTime, setCoins, nValueIn))
3372  return false;
3373 
3374  if (setCoins.empty())
3375  return false;
3376 
3377  int64_t nCredit = 0;
3378  CScript scriptPubKeyKernel;
3379  CTxDB txdb("r");
3380  BOOST_FOREACH(PAIRTYPE(const CWalletTx*, unsigned int) pcoin, setCoins)
3381  {
3382  static int nMaxStakeSearchInterval = 60;
3383  bool fKernelFound = false;
3384  for (unsigned int n=0; n<min(nSearchInterval,(int64_t)nMaxStakeSearchInterval) && !fKernelFound && pindexPrev == pindexBest; n++)
3385  {
3386  boost::this_thread::interruption_point();
3387  // Search backward in time from the given txNew timestamp
3388  // Search nSearchInterval seconds back up to nMaxStakeSearchInterval
3389  COutPoint prevoutStake = COutPoint(pcoin.first->GetHash(), pcoin.second);
3390  int64_t nBlockTime;
3391  if (CheckKernel(pindexPrev, nBits, txNew.nTime - n, prevoutStake, &nBlockTime))
3392  {
3393  // Found a kernel
3394  LogPrint("coinstake", "CreateCoinStake : kernel found\n");
3395  vector<valtype> vSolutions;
3396  txnouttype whichType;
3397  CScript scriptPubKeyOut;
3398  scriptPubKeyKernel = pcoin.first->vout[pcoin.second].scriptPubKey;
3399  if (!Solver(scriptPubKeyKernel, whichType, vSolutions))
3400  {
3401  LogPrint("coinstake", "CreateCoinStake : failed to parse kernel\n");
3402  break;
3403  }
3404  LogPrint("coinstake", "CreateCoinStake : parsed kernel type=%d\n", whichType);
3405  if (whichType != TX_PUBKEY && whichType != TX_PUBKEYHASH)
3406  {
3407  LogPrint("coinstake", "CreateCoinStake : no support for kernel type=%d\n", whichType);
3408  break; // only support pay to public key and pay to address
3409  }
3410  if (whichType == TX_PUBKEYHASH) // pay to address type
3411  {
3412  // convert to pay to public key type
3413  if (!keystore.GetKey(uint160(vSolutions[0]), key))
3414  {
3415  LogPrint("coinstake", "CreateCoinStake : failed to get key for kernel type=%d\n", whichType);
3416  break; // unable to find corresponding public key
3417  }
3418  scriptPubKeyOut << key.GetPubKey() << OP_CHECKSIG;
3419  }
3420  if (whichType == TX_PUBKEY)
3421  {
3422  valtype& vchPubKey = vSolutions[0];
3423  if (!keystore.GetKey(Hash160(vchPubKey), key))
3424  {
3425  LogPrint("coinstake", "CreateCoinStake : failed to get key for kernel type=%d\n", whichType);
3426  break; // unable to find corresponding public key
3427  }
3428 
3429  if (key.GetPubKey() != vchPubKey)
3430  {
3431  LogPrint("coinstake", "CreateCoinStake : invalid key for kernel type=%d\n", whichType);
3432  break; // keys mismatch
3433  }
3434 
3435  scriptPubKeyOut = scriptPubKeyKernel;
3436  }
3437 
3438  txNew.nTime -= n;
3439  txNew.vin.push_back(CTxIn(pcoin.first->GetHash(), pcoin.second));
3440  nCredit += pcoin.first->vout[pcoin.second].nValue;
3441  vwtxPrev.push_back(pcoin.first);
3442  txNew.vout.push_back(CTxOut(0, scriptPubKeyOut));
3443 
3444  if(nCredit > GetStakeSplitThreshold())
3445  txNew.vout.push_back(CTxOut(0, scriptPubKeyOut)); //split stake
3446  LogPrint("coinstake", "CreateCoinStake : added kernel type=%d\n", whichType);
3447  fKernelFound = true;
3448  break;
3449  }
3450  }
3451 
3452  if (fKernelFound)
3453  break; // if kernel is found stop searching
3454  }
3455 
3456  if (nCredit == 0 || nCredit > nBalance - nReserveBalance)
3457  return false;
3458 
3459  BOOST_FOREACH(PAIRTYPE(const CWalletTx*, unsigned int) pcoin, setCoins)
3460  {
3461  // Attempt to add more inputs
3462  // Only add coins of the same key/address as kernel
3463  if (txNew.vout.size() == 2 && ((pcoin.first->vout[pcoin.second].scriptPubKey == scriptPubKeyKernel || pcoin.first->vout[pcoin.second].scriptPubKey == txNew.vout[1].scriptPubKey))
3464  && pcoin.first->GetHash() != txNew.vin[0].prevout.hash)
3465  {
3466  int64_t nTimeWeight = GetWeight((int64_t)pcoin.first->nTime, (int64_t)txNew.nTime);
3467 
3468  // Stop adding more inputs if already too many inputs
3469  if (txNew.vin.size() >= 100)
3470  break;
3471  // Stop adding more inputs if value is already pretty significant
3472  if (nCredit >= GetStakeCombineThreshold())
3473  break;
3474  // Stop adding inputs if reached reserve limit
3475  if (nCredit + pcoin.first->vout[pcoin.second].nValue > nBalance - nReserveBalance)
3476  break;
3477  // Do not add additional significant input
3478  if (pcoin.first->vout[pcoin.second].nValue >= GetStakeCombineThreshold())
3479  continue;
3480  // Do not add input that is still too young
3481  if (nTimeWeight < nStakeMinAge)
3482  continue;
3483 
3484  txNew.vin.push_back(CTxIn(pcoin.first->GetHash(), pcoin.second));
3485  nCredit += pcoin.first->vout[pcoin.second].nValue;
3486  vwtxPrev.push_back(pcoin.first);
3487  }
3488  }
3489 
3490  // Calculate coin age reward
3491  int64_t nReward;
3492  {
3493  uint64_t nCoinAge;
3494  CTxDB txdb("r");
3495  if (!txNew.GetCoinAge(txdb, pindexPrev, nCoinAge))
3496  return error("CreateCoinStake : failed to calculate coin age");
3497 
3498  nReward = GetCoinstakeValue(nCoinAge, nFees, pindexPrev->nHeight+1);
3499  if (nReward <= 0)
3500  return false;
3501 
3502  nCredit += nReward;
3503  }
3504 
3505  // Masternode Payments
3506  int payments = 1;
3507  // start masternode payments
3508  bool bMasterNodePayment = true;
3509 
3510  CScript payee;
3511  CTxIn vin;
3512  bool hasPayment = true;
3513  if(bMasterNodePayment) {
3514  //spork
3515  if(!masternodePayments.GetBlockPayee(pindexPrev->nHeight+1, payee, vin)){
3516  CMasternode* winningNode = mnodeman.GetCurrentMasterNode(1);
3517  if(winningNode){
3518  payee = GetScriptForDestination(winningNode->pubkey.GetID());
3519  } else {
3520  return error("CreateCoinStake: Failed to detect masternode to pay\n");
3521  }
3522  }
3523  }
3524 
3525  if(hasPayment){
3526  payments = txNew.vout.size() + 1;
3527  txNew.vout.resize(payments);
3528 
3529  txNew.vout[payments-1].scriptPubKey = payee;
3530  txNew.vout[payments-1].nValue = 0;
3531 
3532  CTxDestination address1;
3533  ExtractDestination(payee, address1);
3534  CIonAddress address2(address1);
3535 
3536  LogPrintf("Masternode payment to %s\n", address2.ToString().c_str());
3537  }
3538 
3539  int64_t blockValue = nCredit;
3540  int64_t masternodePayment = GetMasternodePayment(pindexPrev->nHeight+1, nReward);
3541 
3542 
3543  // Set output amount
3544  if (!hasPayment && txNew.vout.size() == 3) // 2 stake outputs, stake was split, no masternode payment
3545  {
3546  txNew.vout[1].nValue = (blockValue / 2 / CENT) * CENT;
3547  txNew.vout[2].nValue = blockValue - txNew.vout[1].nValue;
3548  }
3549  else if(hasPayment && txNew.vout.size() == 4) // 2 stake outputs, stake was split, plus a masternode payment
3550  {
3551  txNew.vout[payments-1].nValue = masternodePayment;
3552  blockValue -= masternodePayment;
3553  txNew.vout[1].nValue = (blockValue / 2 / CENT) * CENT;
3554  txNew.vout[2].nValue = blockValue - txNew.vout[1].nValue;
3555  }
3556  else if(!hasPayment && txNew.vout.size() == 2) // only 1 stake output, was not split, no masternode payment
3557  txNew.vout[1].nValue = blockValue;
3558  else if(hasPayment && txNew.vout.size() == 3) // only 1 stake output, was not split, plus a masternode payment
3559  {
3560  txNew.vout[payments-1].nValue = masternodePayment;
3561  blockValue -= masternodePayment;
3562  txNew.vout[1].nValue = blockValue;
3563  }
3564 
3565  // Sign
3566  int nIn = 0;
3567  BOOST_FOREACH(const CWalletTx* pcoin, vwtxPrev)
3568  {
3569  if (!SignSignature(*this, *pcoin, txNew, nIn++))
3570  return error("CreateCoinStake : failed to sign coinstake");
3571  }
3572 
3573  // Limit size
3574  unsigned int nBytes = ::GetSerializeSize(txNew, SER_NETWORK, PROTOCOL_VERSION);
3575  if (nBytes >= MAX_BLOCK_SIZE_GEN/5)
3576  return error("CreateCoinStake : exceeded coinstake size limit");
3577 
3578  // Successfully generated coinstake
3579  return true;
3580 }

3583 // Call after CreateTransaction unless you want to abort
3584 bool CWallet::CommitTransaction(CWalletTx& wtxNew, CReserveKey& reservekey, std::string strCommand)
3585 {
3586  mapValue_t mapNarr;
3587  FindStealthTransactions(wtxNew, mapNarr);
3588 
3589  if (!mapNarr.empty())
3590  {
3591  BOOST_FOREACH(const PAIRTYPE(string,string)& item, mapNarr)
3592  wtxNew.mapValue[item.first] = item.second;
3593  };
3594 
3595  {
3596  LOCK2(cs_main, cs_wallet);
3597  LogPrintf("CommitTransaction:\n%s", wtxNew.ToString());
3598  {
3599  // This is only to keep the database open to defeat the auto-flush for the
3600  // duration of this scope. This is the only place where this optimization
3601  // maybe makes sense; please don't do it anywhere else.
3602  CWalletDB* pwalletdb = fFileBacked ? new CWalletDB(strWalletFile,"r") : NULL;
3603 
3604  // Take key pair from key pool so it won't be used again
3605  reservekey.KeepKey();
3606 
3607  // Add tx to wallet, because if it has change it's also ours,
3608  // otherwise just for transaction history.
3609  AddToWallet(wtxNew);
3610 
3611  // Mark old coins as spent
3612  set<CWalletTx*> setCoins;
3613  BOOST_FOREACH(const CTxIn& txin, wtxNew.vin)
3614  {
3615  CWalletTx &coin = mapWallet[txin.prevout.hash];
3616  coin.BindWallet(this);
3617  coin.MarkSpent(txin.prevout.n);
3618  coin.WriteToDisk();
3619  NotifyTransactionChanged(this, coin.GetHash(), CT_UPDATED);
3620  }
3621 
3622  if (fFileBacked)
3623  delete pwalletdb;
3624  }
3625 
3626  // Track how many getdata requests our transaction gets
3627  mapRequestCount[wtxNew.GetHash()] = 0;
3628 
3629  // Broadcast
3630  if (!wtxNew.AcceptToMemoryPool(false))
3631  {
3632  // This must not fail. The transaction has already been signed and recorded.
3633  LogPrintf("CommitTransaction() : Error: Transaction not valid\n");
3634  return false;
3635  }
3636  wtxNew.RelayWalletTransaction(strCommand);
3637  }
3638  return true;
3639 }

3648  wtxOrdered.insert(make_pair(entry.nOrderPos, TxPair((CWalletTx*)0, &entry)));
3649 
3650  return true;

3653 string CWallet::SendMoney(CScript scriptPubKey, CAmount nValue, std::string& sNarr, CWalletTx& wtxNew, bool fAskFee)
3654 {
3655  CReserveKey reservekey(this);
3656  CAmount nFeeRequired;
3657 
3658  if (IsLocked())
3659  {
3660  string strError = _("Error: Wallet locked, unable to create transaction!");
3661  LogPrintf("SendMoney() : %s", strError);
3662  return strError;
3663  }
3664  if (fWalletUnlockStakingOnly)
3665  {
3666  string strError = _("Error: Wallet unlocked for staking only, unable to create transaction.");
3667  LogPrintf("SendMoney() : %s", strError);
3668  return strError;
3669  }
3670 
3671  CWalletTx wtx;
3672  std::vector<std::pair<CScript, int64_t> > vecSend;
3673  vecSend.push_back(make_pair(scriptPubKey, nValue));
3674  string strError = "";
3675 
3676 
3677  if (!CreateTransaction(scriptPubKey, nValue, sNarr, wtxNew, reservekey, nFeeRequired))
3678  {
3679  string strError;
3680  if (nValue + nFeeRequired > GetBalance())
3681  strError = strprintf(_("Error: This transaction requires a transaction fee of at least %s because of its amount, complexity, or use of recently received funds!"), FormatMoney(nFeeRequired));
3682  else
3683  strError = "Failed to Create transaction";
3684 
3685  LogPrintf("SendMoney() : %s\n", strError);
3686  return strError;
3687  }
3688 
3689  if (!CommitTransaction(wtxNew, reservekey))
3690  return _("Error: The transaction was rejected! This might happen if some of the coins in your wallet were already spent, such as if you used a copy of wallet.dat and coins were spent in the copy but not marked as spent here.");
3691 
3692  return "";
3693 }

3729 string CWallet::PrepareStashedsendDenominate(int minRounds, int maxRounds)
3730 {
3731  if (IsLocked())
3732  return _("Error: Wallet locked, unable to create transaction!");
3733 
3734  if(stashedSendPool.GetState() != POOL_STATUS_ERROR && stashedSendPool.GetState() != POOL_STATUS_SUCCESS)
3735  if(stashedSendPool.GetEntriesCount() > 0)
3736  return _("Error: You already have pending entries in the Stashedsend pool");
3737 
3738  // ** find the coins we'll use
3739  std::vector<CTxIn> vCoins;
3740  std::vector<CTxIn> vCoinsResult;
3741  std::vector<COutput> vCoins2;
3742  CAmount nValueIn = 0;
3743  CReserveKey reservekey(this);
3744 
3745  /*
3746  Select the coins we'll use
3747 
3748  if minRounds >= 0 it means only denominated inputs are going in and coming out
3749  */
3750  if(minRounds >= 0){
3751  if (!SelectCoinsByDenominations(stashedSendPool.sessionDenom, 0.1*COIN, STASHEDSEND_POOL_MAX, vCoins, vCoins2, nValueIn, minRounds, maxRounds))
3752  return _("Error: Can't select current denominated inputs");
3753  }
3754 
3755  LogPrintf("PrepareStashedsendDenominate - preparing stashedsend denominate . Got: %d \n", nValueIn);
3756 
3757  {
3758  LOCK(cs_wallet);
3759  BOOST_FOREACH(CTxIn v, vCoins)
3760  LockCoin(v.prevout);
3761  }
3762 
3763  CAmount nValueLeft = nValueIn;
3764  std::vector<CTxOut> vOut;
3765 
3766  /*
3767  TODO: Front load with needed denominations (e.g. .1, 1 )
3768  */
3769 
3770  // Make outputs by looping through denominations: try to add every needed denomination, repeat up to 5-10 times.
3771  // This way we can be pretty sure that it should have at least one of each needed denomination.
3772  // NOTE: No need to randomize order of inputs because they were
3773  // initially shuffled in CWallet::SelectCoinsByDenominations already.
3774  int nStep = 0;
3775  int nStepsMax = 5 + GetRandInt(5);
3776  while(nStep < nStepsMax) {
3777 
3778  BOOST_FOREACH(int64_t v, stashedSendDenominations){
3779  // only use the ones that are approved
3780  bool fAccepted = false;
3781  if((stashedSendPool.sessionDenom & (1 << 0)) && v == ((1000*COIN) +1000000)) {fAccepted = true;}
3782  else if((stashedSendPool.sessionDenom & (1 << 1)) && v == ((100*COIN) +100000)) {fAccepted = true;}
3783  else if((stashedSendPool.sessionDenom & (1 << 2)) && v == ((10*COIN) +10000)) {fAccepted = true;}
3784  else if((stashedSendPool.sessionDenom & (1 << 3)) && v == ((1*COIN) +1000)) {fAccepted = true;}
3785  else if((stashedSendPool.sessionDenom & (1 << 4)) && v == ((.1*COIN) +100)) {fAccepted = true;}
3786  if(!fAccepted) continue;
3787 
3788  // try to add it
3789  if(nValueLeft - v >= 0) {
3790  // Note: this relies on a fact that both vectors MUST have same size
3791  std::vector<CTxIn>::iterator it = vCoins.begin();
3792  std::vector<COutput>::iterator it2 = vCoins2.begin();
3793  while(it2 != vCoins2.end()) {
3794  // we have matching inputs
3795  if((*it2).tx->vout[(*it2).i].nValue == v) {
3796  // add new input in resulting vector
3797  vCoinsResult.push_back(*it);
3798  // remove corresponting items from initial vectors
3799  vCoins.erase(it);
3800  vCoins2.erase(it2);
3801 
3802  CScript scriptChange;
3803  CPubKey vchPubKey;
3804  // use a unique change address
3805  assert(reservekey.GetReservedKey(vchPubKey)); // should never fail, as we just unlocked
3806  scriptChange = GetScriptForDestination(vchPubKey.GetID());
3807  reservekey.KeepKey();
3808 
3809  // add new output
3810  CTxOut o(v, scriptChange);
3811  vOut.push_back(o);
3812 
3813  // subtract denomination amount
3814  nValueLeft -= v;
3815 
3816  break;
3817  }
3818  ++it;
3819  ++it2;
3820  }
3821  }
3822  }
3823 
3824  nStep++;
3825 
3826  if(nValueLeft == 0) break;
3827  }
3828 
3829  {
3830  // unlock unused coins
3831  LOCK(cs_wallet);
3832  BOOST_FOREACH(CTxIn v, vCoins)
3833  UnlockCoin(v.prevout);
3834  }
3835 
3836  if(stashedSendPool.GetDenominations(vOut) != stashedSendPool.sessionDenom) {
3837  // unlock used coins on failure
3838  LOCK(cs_wallet);
3839  BOOST_FOREACH(CTxIn v, vCoinsResult)
3840  UnlockCoin(v.prevout);
3841  return "Error: can't make current denominated outputs";
3842  }
3843 
3844  // randomize the output order
3845  std::random_shuffle (vOut.begin(), vOut.end());
3846 
3847  // We also do not care about full amount as long as we have right denominations, just pass what we found
3848  stashedSendPool.SendStashedsendDenominate(vCoinsResult, vOut, nValueIn - nValueLeft);
3849 
3850  return "";
3851 }

3867  // the requires a new key.

3870

3872  return nLoadWalletRet;
3873  fFirstRunRet = !vchDefaultKey.IsValid();
3874 
3875  return DB_LOAD_OK;

3993 bool CWallet::TopUpKeyPool(unsigned int nSize)
3994 {
3995  {
3996  LOCK(cs_wallet);
3997 
3998  if (IsLocked())
3999  return false;
4000 
4001  CWalletDB walletdb(strWalletFile);
4002 
4003  // Top up key pool
4004  unsigned int nTargetSize;
4005  fLiteMode = GetBoolArg("-litemode", false);
4006 
4007  if (nSize > 0)
4008  nTargetSize = nSize;
4009  else if (fLiteMode)
4010  nTargetSize = max(GetArg("-keypool", 100), (int64_t)0);
4011  else
4012  nTargetSize = max(GetArg("-keypool", 1000), (int64_t)0);
4013 
4014  while (setKeyPool.size() < (nTargetSize + 1))
4015  {
4016  int64_t nEnd = 1;
4017  if (!setKeyPool.empty())
4018  nEnd = *(--setKeyPool.end()) + 1;
4019  if (!walletdb.WritePool(nEnd, CKeyPool(GenerateNewKey())))
4020  throw runtime_error("TopUpKeyPool() : writing generated key failed");
4021  setKeyPool.insert(nEnd);
4022  LogPrintf("keypool added key %d, size=%u\n", nEnd, setKeyPool.size());
4023  double dProgress = 100.f * nEnd / (nTargetSize + 1);
4024  std::string strMsg = strprintf(_("Loading wallet... (%3.2f %%)"), dProgress);
4025  uiInterface.InitMessage(strMsg);
4026  }
4027  }
4028  return true;
4029 }

4032 void CWallet::ReserveKeyFromKeyPool(int64_t& nIndex, CKeyPool& keypool)
4033 {
4034  nIndex = -1;
4035  keypool.vchPubKey = CPubKey();
4036  {
4037  LOCK(cs_wallet);
4038 
4039  if (!IsLocked())
4040  TopUpKeyPool();
4041 
4042  // Get the oldest key
4043  if(setKeyPool.empty())
4044  return;
4045 
4046  CWalletDB walletdb(strWalletFile);
4047 
4048  nIndex = *(setKeyPool.begin());
4049  setKeyPool.erase(setKeyPool.begin());
4050  if (!walletdb.ReadPool(nIndex, keypool))
4051  throw runtime_error("ReserveKeyFromKeyPool() : read failed");
4052  if (!HaveKey(keypool.vchPubKey.GetID()))
4053  throw runtime_error("ReserveKeyFromKeyPool() : unknown key in key pool");
4054  assert(keypool.vchPubKey.IsValid());
4055  LogPrintf("keypool reserve %d\n", nIndex);
4056  }
4057 }

4125 std::map<CTxDestination, int64_t> CWallet::GetAddressBalances()
4126 {
4127  map<CTxDestination, int64_t> balances;
4128 
4129  {
4130  LOCK(cs_wallet);
4131  BOOST_FOREACH(PAIRTYPE(uint256, CWalletTx) walletEntry, mapWallet)
4132  {
4133  CWalletTx *pcoin = &walletEntry.second;
4134 
4135  if (!IsFinalTx(*pcoin) || !pcoin->IsTrusted())
4136  continue;
4137 
4138  if ((pcoin->IsCoinBase() || pcoin->IsCoinStake()) && pcoin->GetBlocksToMaturity() > 0)
4139  continue;
4140 
4141  int nDepth = pcoin->GetDepthInMainChain();
4142  if (nDepth < (pcoin->IsFromMe(ISMINE_ALL) ? 0 : 1))
4143  continue;
4144 
4145  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < pcoin->vout.size(); i++)
4146  {
4147  CTxDestination addr;
4148  if (!IsMine(pcoin->vout[i]))
4149  continue;
4150  if(!ExtractDestination(pcoin->vout[i].scriptPubKey, addr))
4151  continue;
4152 
4153  int64_t n = pcoin->IsSpent(i) ? 0 : pcoin->vout[i].nValue;
4154 
4155  if (!balances.count(addr))
4156  balances[addr] = 0;
4157  balances[addr] += n;
4158  }
4159  }
4160  }
4161 
4162  return balances;
4163 }
4164 
4165 set< set<CTxDestination> > CWallet::GetAddressGroupings()
4166 {
4167  AssertLockHeld(cs_wallet); // mapWallet
4168  set< set<CTxDestination> > groupings;
4169  set<CTxDestination> grouping;
4170 
4171  BOOST_FOREACH(PAIRTYPE(uint256, CWalletTx) walletEntry, mapWallet)
4172  {
4173  CWalletTx *pcoin = &walletEntry.second;
4174 
4175  if (pcoin->vin.size() > 0 && IsMine(pcoin->vin[0]))
4176  {
4177  bool any_mine = false;
4178  // group all input addresses with each other
4179  BOOST_FOREACH(CTxIn txin, pcoin->vin)
4180  {
4181  CTxDestination address;
4182  if(!IsMine(txin)) /* If this input isn't mine, ignore it */
4183  continue;
4184  if(!ExtractDestination(mapWallet[txin.prevout.hash].vout[txin.prevout.n].scriptPubKey, address))
4185  continue;
4186  grouping.insert(address);
4187  any_mine = true;
4188  }
4189 
4190  // group change with input addresses
4191  if (any_mine)
4192  {
4193  BOOST_FOREACH(CTxOut txout, pcoin->vout)
4194  {
4195  if (IsChange(txout))
4196  {
4197  CWalletTx tx = mapWallet[pcoin->vin[0].prevout.hash];
4198  CTxDestination txoutAddr;
4199  if(!ExtractDestination(txout.scriptPubKey, txoutAddr))
4200  continue;
4201  grouping.insert(txoutAddr);
4202  }
4203  }
4204  }
4205  if (grouping.size() > 0)
4206  {
4207  groupings.insert(grouping);
4208  grouping.clear();
4209  }
4210  }
4211 
4212  // group lone addrs by themselves
4213  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < pcoin->vout.size(); i++)
4214  if (IsMine(pcoin->vout[i]))
4215  {
4216  CTxDestination address;
4217  if(!ExtractDestination(pcoin->vout[i].scriptPubKey, address))
4218  continue;
4219  grouping.insert(address);
4220  groupings.insert(grouping);
4221  grouping.clear();
4222  }
4223  }
4224 
4225  set< set<CTxDestination>* > uniqueGroupings; // a set of pointers to groups of addresses
4226  map< CTxDestination, set<CTxDestination>* > setmap; // map addresses to the unique group containing it
4227  BOOST_FOREACH(set<CTxDestination> grouping, groupings)
4228  {
4229  // make a set of all the groups hit by this new group
4230  set< set<CTxDestination>* > hits;
4231  map< CTxDestination, set<CTxDestination>* >::iterator it;
4232  BOOST_FOREACH(CTxDestination address, grouping)
4233  if ((it = setmap.find(address)) != setmap.end())
4234  hits.insert((*it).second);
4235 
4236  // merge all hit groups into a new single group and delete old groups
4237  set<CTxDestination>* merged = new set<CTxDestination>(grouping);
4238  BOOST_FOREACH(set<CTxDestination>* hit, hits)
4239  {
4240  merged->insert(hit->begin(), hit->end());
4241  uniqueGroupings.erase(hit);
4242  delete hit;
4243  }
4244  uniqueGroupings.insert(merged);
4245 
4246  // update setmap
4247  BOOST_FOREACH(CTxDestination element, *merged)
4248  setmap[element] = merged;
4249  }
4250 
4251  set< set<CTxDestination> > ret;
4252  BOOST_FOREACH(set<CTxDestination>* uniqueGrouping, uniqueGroupings)
4253  {
4254  ret.insert(*uniqueGrouping);
4255  delete uniqueGrouping;
4256  }
4257 
4258  return ret;
4259 }
4260 
4261 // ion: check 'spent' consistency between wallet and txindex
4262 // ion: fix wallet spent state according to txindex
4263 void CWallet::FixSpentCoins(int& nMismatchFound, int64_t& nBalanceInQuestion, bool fCheckOnly)
4264 {
4265  nMismatchFound = 0;
4266  nBalanceInQuestion = 0;
4267 
4268  LOCK(cs_wallet);
4269  vector<CWalletTx*> vCoins;
4270  vCoins.reserve(mapWallet.size());
4271  for (map<uint256, CWalletTx>::iterator it = mapWallet.begin(); it != mapWallet.end(); ++it)
4272  vCoins.push_back(&(*it).second);
4273 
4274  CTxDB txdb("r");
4275  BOOST_FOREACH(CWalletTx* pcoin, vCoins)
4276  {
4277  // Find the corresponding transaction index
4278  CTxIndex txindex;
4279  if (!txdb.ReadTxIndex(pcoin->GetHash(), txindex))
4280  continue;
4281  for (unsigned int n=0; n < pcoin->vout.size(); n++)
4282  {
4283  if (IsMine(pcoin->vout[n]) && pcoin->IsSpent(n) && (txindex.vSpent.size() <= n || txindex.vSpent[n].IsNull()))
4284  {
4285  LogPrintf("FixSpentCoins found lost coin %s ION %s[%d], %s\n",
4286  FormatMoney(pcoin->vout[n].nValue), pcoin->GetHash().ToString(), n, fCheckOnly? "repair not attempted" : "repairing");
4287  nMismatchFound++;
4288  nBalanceInQuestion += pcoin->vout[n].nValue;
4289  if (!fCheckOnly)
4290  {
4291  pcoin->MarkUnspent(n);
4292  pcoin->WriteToDisk();
4293  }
4294  }
4295  else if (IsMine(pcoin->vout[n]) && !pcoin->IsSpent(n) && (txindex.vSpent.size() > n && !txindex.vSpent[n].IsNull()))
4296  {
4297  LogPrintf("FixSpentCoins found spent coin %s ION %s[%d], %s\n",
4298  FormatMoney(pcoin->vout[n].nValue), pcoin->GetHash().ToString(), n, fCheckOnly? "repair not attempted" : "repairing");
4299  nMismatchFound++;
4300  nBalanceInQuestion += pcoin->vout[n].nValue;
4301  if (!fCheckOnly)
4302  {
4303  pcoin->MarkSpent(n);
4304  pcoin->WriteToDisk();
4305  }
4306  }
4307  }
4308  }
4309 }
4310 
4311 // ion: disable transaction (only for coinstake)
4312 void CWallet::DisableTransaction(const CTransaction &tx)
4313 {
4314  if (!tx.IsCoinStake() || !IsFromMe(tx))
4315  return; // only disconnecting coinstake requires marking input unspent
4316 
4317  LOCK(cs_wallet);
4318  BOOST_FOREACH(const CTxIn& txin, tx.vin)
4319  {
4320  map<uint256, CWalletTx>::iterator mi = mapWallet.find(txin.prevout.hash);
4321  if (mi != mapWallet.end())
4322  {
4323  CWalletTx& prev = (*mi).second;
4324  if (txin.prevout.n < prev.vout.size() && IsMine(prev.vout[txin.prevout.n]))
4325  {
4326  prev.MarkUnspent(txin.prevout.n);
4327  prev.WriteToDisk();
4328  }
4329  }
4330  }
4331 }

4333 bool CReserveKey::GetReservedKey(CPubKey& pubkey)
4334 {
4335  if (nIndex == -1)
4336  {
4337  CKeyPool keypool;
4338  pwallet->ReserveKeyFromKeyPool(nIndex, keypool);
4339  if (nIndex != -1)
4340  vchPubKey = keypool.vchPubKey;
4341  else {
4342  if (pwallet->vchDefaultKey.IsValid()) {
4343  LogPrintf("CReserveKey::GetReservedKey(): Warning: Using default key instead of a new key, top up your keypool!");
4344  vchPubKey = pwallet->vchDefaultKey;
4345  } else
4346  return false;
4347  }
4348  }
4349  assert(vchPubKey.IsValid());
4350  pubkey = vchPubKey;
4351  return true;
4352 }

4440 void CWallet::GetKeyBirthTimes(std::map<CKeyID, int64_t> &mapKeyBirth) const {
4441  AssertLockHeld(cs_wallet); // mapKeyMetadata
4442  mapKeyBirth.clear();
4443 
4444  // get birth times for keys with metadata
4445  for (std::map<CKeyID, CKeyMetadata>::const_iterator it = mapKeyMetadata.begin(); it != mapKeyMetadata.end(); it++)
4446  if (it->second.nCreateTime)
4447  mapKeyBirth[it->first] = it->second.nCreateTime;
4448 
4449  // map in which we'll infer heights of other keys
4450  CBlockIndex *pindexMax = FindBlockByHeight(std::max(0, nBestHeight - 144)); // the tip can be reorganised; use a 144-block safety margin
4451  std::map<CKeyID, CBlockIndex*> mapKeyFirstBlock;
4452  std::set<CKeyID> setKeys;
4453  GetKeys(setKeys);
4454  BOOST_FOREACH(const CKeyID &keyid, setKeys) {
4455  if (mapKeyBirth.count(keyid) == 0)
4456  mapKeyFirstBlock[keyid] = pindexMax;
4457  }
4458  setKeys.clear();
4459 
4460  // if there are no such keys, we're done
4461  if (mapKeyFirstBlock.empty())
4462  return;
4463 
4464  // find first block that affects those keys, if there are any left
4465  std::vector<CKeyID> vAffected;
4466  for (std::map<uint256, CWalletTx>::const_iterator it = mapWallet.begin(); it != mapWallet.end(); it++) {
4467  // iterate over all wallet transactions...
4468  const CWalletTx &wtx = (*it).second;
4469  std::map<uint256, CBlockIndex*>::const_iterator blit = mapBlockIndex.find(wtx.hashBlock);
4470  if (blit != mapBlockIndex.end() && blit->second->IsInMainChain()) {
4471  // ... which are already in a block
4472  int nHeight = blit->second->nHeight;
4473  BOOST_FOREACH(const CTxOut &txout, wtx.vout) {
4474  // iterate over all their outputs
4475  ::ExtractAffectedKeys(*this, txout.scriptPubKey, vAffected);
4476  BOOST_FOREACH(const CKeyID &keyid, vAffected) {
4477  // ... and all their affected keys
4478  std::map<CKeyID, CBlockIndex*>::iterator rit = mapKeyFirstBlock.find(keyid);
4479  if (rit != mapKeyFirstBlock.end() && nHeight < rit->second->nHeight)
4480  rit->second = blit->second;
4481  }
4482  vAffected.clear();
4483  }
4484  }
4485  }
4486 
4487  // Extract block timestamps for those keys
4488  for (std::map<CKeyID, CBlockIndex*>::const_iterator it = mapKeyFirstBlock.begin(); it != mapKeyFirstBlock.end(); it++)
4489  mapKeyBirth[it->first] = it->second->nTime - 7200; // block times can be 2h off
4490 }
